name: Bauergården
description: Located next to Bunn Lake in Gränna, 10 km from Grenna Museum, Bauergården features a common terrace where you can enjoy views of the garden. A communal sauna offers relaxation. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some room have outdoor seating. The restaurant menu offers Nordic-style dishes. A range of activities is offered in the area, such as fishing and canoeing, or you can simply find a spot on the lake beach. The nearest airport is Linköping City Airport, 86 km from the property.

name: Stiftsgården i Rättvik
description: Peacefully located by Lake Siljan, this Rättvik property features a private beach and waterfront terrace with panoramic lake views in a non alcoholic environment. It offers a daily breakfast buffet, along with free sauna and gym access. The bright guest rooms at Stiftsgården i Rättvik are decorated with light wooden furnishings. Each includes a flat-screen TV, work desk and garden views. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas of the property. Stiftsgården’s restaurant serves buffets made with Swedish specialities and locally produced ingredients. Lake views can be enjoyed while dining. In summer, the large garden is an ideal location to relax and enjoy a cup of coffee. Leisure options at Stiftsgården i Rättvik include giant chess and table tennis. Guests wishing to explore the surroundings can rent a bicycle on site and visit the 15th-century Rättvik Church, just 150 metres away.

name: Grimen Camping
description: Grimen Camping has mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Bergen, 15 km from Bergen University. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a fridge. The campground offers a picnic area. A private beach area is available on site and both fishing and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of Grimen Camping. University Museum of Bergen is 15 km from the accommodation, while Rosenkrantz Tower is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bergen, Flesland Airport, 16 km from Grimen Camping.

name: Hotell Refsnes Gods - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Housed in a 18th-century mansion on Jeløy island, Hotel Refsnes Gods features a large collection of Scandinavian art. Each room has a private bathroom and cable TV. WiFi and parking are free. All rooms at the historic Refsnes Gods feature a minibar, tea/coffee facilities and work desk. Some rooms include a seating area, while others have a private, furnished balcony overlooking the Oslofjord. Restaurant Munch has a well-stocked wine cellar and offers a wide variety of dishes including sea food. Breakfast is served daily. Guests enjoy access to a sauna and the hotel's beach. Other facilities include a large surrounding garden. Nearby activities include golf, fishing and diving. Moss city centre is situated 3 km from the hotel. Søndre Jeløya Nature Reserve is within 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel, Oslo
description: Boasting free Wi-Fi and a private beach, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Oslo is located in Baerum and provides comfortable accommodation. It offers 4-star accommodation and views of the park. Guests travelling on business can benefit from a variety of facilities on offer at the hotel, such as a photocopier and business services. There is also a BBQ area on-site for guests to enjoy. Radisson Blu Park Hotel features 251 air conditioned rooms. Each comes with free tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Radisson Blu Park Hotel, Oslo's in-house restaurant provides local-inspired dishes, which can be served on the al fresco terrace. The pub serves European meals and a range of beverages. Radisson Park Hotel Oslo is within walking distance of Telenor Arena and Aker Solutions. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Hardanger Guesthouse
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, a freezer, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Vollsnes Feriehus
description: No description found

name: Holiday Inn Berlin - City East Side
description: Holiday Inn® Berlin - City East Side hotel is steps from the River Spree and a Berlin Wall remnant preserved as a monument and outdoor gallery. From nearby Warschauer Strasse station, the U- and S-Bahn networks provide speedy links to popular East Berlin attractions, such as the GDR-era TV Tower in Alexanderplatz. It’s a 25-minute journey to the imposing Brandenburg Gate and the cultural riches of Museum Island. The airport Berlin-Brandenburg (BER) are 30 minutes away by car. Our family-friendly hotel is next to the Mercedes-Benz Arena, which presents major pop concerts and sporting events. Business guests can host conferences for up to 70 people in our flexible event spaces, while companies such as Zalando, Daimler and Coca-Cola are all within walking distance.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Inclusive Wi-Fi- A mini-gym- Underground parking at a daily rate- Kids Stay and Eat FreeOur welcoming Open Lobby is a multipurpose space where you can relax with a cocktail or a Alfredo coffee, meet colleagues and friends for a meal, or check your emails. Our comfortable, streamlined rooms are decorated in soothing colours. As well as high-quality bedding, they feature pillow menus and blackout blinds to ensure you get a restful night’s sleep.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton Berlin
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Berlin is located in the heart of the city at Potsdamer Platz, neighboring Berlin’s largest inner city park “Tiergarten” and situated just a 7 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate. This superior 5-star hotel has won multiple awards and offers a unique setting in an contemporary style and the highest level of outstanding service. Richly designed and residential in feel, the 303 guest rooms and suites combine exquisite Art Deco design with contemporary touches and hand-selected furnishings recapture the essence of Berlin’s glamorous golden era. Guest can savor a variety of culinary experiences: POTS represents the modern German cuisine, while the elegant The Lounge pampers guests with quality teas and its own menu. The Curtain Club is one of the city's top bars and complete the culinary ensemble the luxury hotel has to offer. To relax and unwind, an elegant wellness facility and the exclusive Club Lounge on the 10th floor welcome guests.Marriott

name: Big Mama Berlin
description: The stylish BIG MAMA Berlin is situated in the north of Berlin, 600 metres from U-Bahn Osloer Straße Underground Station, which offers direct connections to central Berlin in 10-minutes. The hotel features a terrace, a garden and free WiFi is available. Newly opened in December 2013, BIG MAMA Berlin offers apartments, dormitory and hotel rooms, each of which are decorated in a modern style. All the rooms feature a bathroom and seating area. A fresh breakfast buffet is available at an extra charge. There is also a good selection of restaurants and bars within a 10-minute walk. Museum Island is located 5 km from BIG MAMA Berlin, and the Brandenburg Gate is 6 km away. Bikes can also be rented from the accommodation. Gesundbrunnen Train Station is 1.5 km away, and offers direct connections to Berlin Main Train Station within 5-minutes. Schönefeld Airport is a 35-minute drive from Hotel big Mama.

name: Turmhotel Weserblick Bremen
description: This historic, 3-star hotel in Bremen overlooks the River Weser and is just a 15-minute walk from Bremen’s Old Town. It offers free Wi-Fi internet, free parking and classic-style rooms. The Turmhotel Weserblick Bremen offers spacious rooms with a desk and private bathroom. Some have cable TV and many feature river views. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. The bar serves a variety of drinks in the evenings. Bremen Train Station is 1.8 km from the Turmhotel. Weser Stadium is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Mykonos Blanc
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

name: Ubud Mykonos
description: When you stay at Ubud Mykonos in Mykonos, you'll be on the beach, a 4-minute drive from Ornos Beach and 7 minutes from Windmills of Mykonos. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Myconian Panoptis Escape - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Set in Elia Beach, Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a hot tub, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with pool view. At Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, every room includes a seating area. Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World offers a barbecue. Bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Agrari Beach is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Kivotos Mykonos
description: Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel is situated on Mykonos Island, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach and a saltwater swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and squash courts. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Mykonos Spa Club. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Part of the premium service at Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. Deluxe fixtures include a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite channels and luxury linen and luxury toiletries. A mini bar, a seating area and a private balcony are also included. The chic bar is a convenient place to relax with a drink before a meal at the restaurant, which offers international and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. Within a 20-minute drive of Paradise Beach and Mykonos Island National Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. Guests can also take an easy stroll to Agios Ioannis and Psarou.Revato

name: Mykonos Moussa
description: No description found

name: Casa Del Mar Mykonos Seaside Resort
description: No description found

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini
description: The 5-star Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini is set on the beachfront in Agia Paraskeyi, 5 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera. The property features a private beach area, as well as a fitness centre and views over the Aegean Sea. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides an outdoor pool as well as a hot tub. All stylishly outlined guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast sea views. Guest rooms at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. There is an in-house restaurant, which specialises in sophisticated cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini offers a sauna, as well as relaxation and fitness experiences at Nikki Spa and Tone Gym. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 5 km from Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, while Central Bus Station is 5 km from the property. Santorini International Airport is 1 km away.

name: Villa Nefeli
description: Just 50 metres from the black sandy beach of Perissa, this family run hotel offers rooms with private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi. The town centre is 2 minutes walk. Featuring a balcony, all air-conditioned rooms are spacious and traditionally decorated. Each has a kitchenette with fridge. The bathroom comes with a shower. Villa Nefeli has a patio with tables and chairs. There is a barbeque available for common use at the hotel’s yard. Hotel guests enjoy discounted rates at the Perissa Diving Centre, offering a wide range of water sports including diving, water ski and wind surfing. Villa Nefeli is 15 km away from Fira. Monolithos Airport is 15 km away, while Athinios, Santorini’s main port is 12 km away.

name: Golden Star City Resort
description: The Golden Star Hotel is a modern property situated on the beach of Peraia. It offers rooms with free WiFi and private balconies. The centre of Thessaloniki City is a 30-minute drive away. The air-conditioned guestrooms of Golden Star have modern décor with light wooden furniture and bright fabrics. Each has a safe box and a satellite TV. A hairdryer is included. Mpoukadoura Restaurant serves an extensive range of creative Greek cuisine in a light, modern setting. Guests may enjoy a drink or snack from the bar overlooking the gulf of Thermaikos and the city of Thessaloniki. American breakfast is daily served. Guests can relax at the sun beds and umbrellas on the private beach. A well-equipped business centre is available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with advice on the hotel and surrounding. Several shops and a fitness centre are 100 metres away while the centre of Thessaloniki is a 30-minute drive away. Makedonia International Airport is 8 km, approximately 15 minutes by car.

name: Domes Noruz Chania, Autograph Collection- Adults Only
address: Strati Pantelaki 5, Agioi Apostoloi, Agioi Apostoloi (Crete) 731 00
description: Located in a dreamy seaside setting, Domes Noruz Chania is an adults-only 16+ lifestyle resort awarded for its novel design that combines modern Greek design with a wide range of experiences and a cosmopolitan view of the world. From delicious cocktails of local ingredients to moonlit live jazz events at the beach and helicopter rides at the breathtaking Samaria Gorge, guests are invited to a highly curated world where unique experiences are the forefront. By embracing the past and the present of the city Noruz offers a fresh, contemporary way for design-savvy guests to explore Chania and enjoy it differently. The hotel's close proximity to the city makes it even more ideal, as Chania is amongst Mediterranean’s ‘must see’ cultural destinations. The old town offers a blend of Ottoman, Venetian and Greek architectures creating a stunning setting. The promenade, the old light house, the Venetian castle, the port and the Turkish mosque are perfect for exploration.Marriott

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Marika Hotel
description: Offering sea-view studios, Marika Hotel is situated directly on Platania’s beachfront. Highlights include an outdoor pool with a pool bar restaurant by the sea and an Italian restaurant. The resort’s busy center is only 200 meters from the hotel. Guests can enjoy the breakfast buffet that is served by the sea. Snacks and drinks are available on the poolside. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Marika Hotel’s cafe bar also features a wide-screen TV for your entertainment. Platanias is located in west Crete, just 11 km west of Chania. Guests of the Marika also benefit from free parking on-site.

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach. The ultramodern guest rooms have a large bathroom with a tub and a shower, and are fitted with parquet floors. A flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and free Wi-Fi are standard. Some rooms have a private or shared pool, or a spacious terrace with hot tub. The Avra Imperial Hotel offers 3 swimming pools, including a freshwater children’s pool. The spa offers 10 massage rooms and a beauty salon. A state-of-the-art gym, steam room, Finnish sauna and indoor pool are available. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant offering a pool-facing terrace. Guests can sample traditional Cretan, Italian and international dishes at the hotel’s 4 à la carte restaurants. Room service is available. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to the centre of Kolimvari and 23 km west of Chania. The hotel is 35 km from Chania International Airport. The famous Samaria gorge is a 40-minute drive (58 km).

name: Klinakis Beach Hotel
description: Overlooking the sea and the picturesque town of Chania, Klinakis Hotel is situated on a low hill right by the seafront. It offers free parking and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Klinakis Hotel features spacious, sunny and airy rooms, all complete with their own private bathroom. A fridge is provided in each, and safes are available for hire through reception. Several rooms enjoy beautiful views of the sea from their private balconies. In the morning, the hotel serves Greek breakfast in the dining room. Guests can enjoy a cup of coffee or a drink in the bar, the hotel’s terrace or on their private balcony. With a convenient location just 800 metres from Chania centre, Klinakis guests enjoy easy access to the many cafes, bars and some of the finest restaurants on the island of Crete. Chania Airport and Souda Port are each 8 km away.

name: Iolida Beach
description: Just a few metres from Agia Marina Beach, Iolida Beach Hotel comprises of 2 buildings linked with an impressive glass-walkway bridge providing easy access to all areas of the hotel. Simply yet elegantly furnished, most bright units at Iolida open to a private balcony. Each comes with free wired internet, a TV and a kitchenette with oven and mini fridge. A hairdryer and free toiletries are included. Guests may start their day with a buffet breakfast at the on-site, à la carte restaurant, where lunch and dinner dishes are served. Light meals and refreshing beverages are prepared at the snack bar. Sun loungers are offered by the pool where guests may relax or enjoy a game of billiards. Meeting facilities as well as a children’s playground for the younger guests’ entertainment are available. A fitness centre is at the disposal of those who are interested in keeping fit, while massage treatments are featured. Several taverns and bars can be found within short walking distance. Souda Port is 17 km away and the city of Chania with its scenic old port is at a distance of 10 km. Ioannis Daskalogiannis International Airport is 30 km away.

name: Vergina Beach Hotel
description: Set right on the sandy beach of Agia Marina, Vergina Beach Hotel offers free WiFi in all areas and air-conditioned accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea. It includes a a swimming pool by the seaside and a plunge-spa pool with waterfall. Vergina studios, suites and apartments are simply, yet tastefully furnished, with a private balcony. They include a kitchenette with electric kettle and mini fridge, as well as a flat-screen TV. At the beach restaurant, you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and snacks. The cocktail bar serves cocktails, drinks and pizzas, and it also features 8 large flat-screen TVs. Within a few metres from the property, you will find a bakery, two super markets, ATMs, a bank, as well as bars and restaurants. The town and port of Chania are around 8 km away from Vergina Beach Hotel. Chania Airport is 17 km away.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Sunny Bay Hotel
description: On the beachfront of Kissamos, Sunny Bay Hotel Hotel offers accommodation with sea or pool views, traditional Cretan cuisine and free WiFi throughout. Kissamos centre is just a short stroll away. Sunny Bay Hotel’s restaurant serves an extensive buffet of local and international dishes during breakfast and dinner. The indoor and pool bars are perfect for drinks. Staff can provide beach umbrellas or arrange bicycle rental. Sunny Bay Hotel features a games area with table tennis and billiards. An on-site store is available for necessities. Each air-conditioned room includes a private balcony with outdoor seating area. Rooms also feature satellite TVs and well-stocked mini bars. Famous Falassarna beach is just 15 km away and the archaeological site of Polyrinia is only a 10-minute drive. Chania Airport is 50 km away.

name: Theo Beach Hotel Apartments
description: Located on a sandy beach in Rethymno, Theo Beach Hotel Apartments offers spacious studios with large balcony with views of the sea and a swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. The air-conditioned studios and apartments at Theo Beach Hotel have a balcony, tea/coffee facilities and a kitchen with dining area. All bathrooms have a hairdryer. Theo Hotel is only 400 metres from the old town of Rethymnon and the Venetian harbour.

name: Elite Suites By Rhodes Bay
description: 5-star Elite Suites by Rhodes Bay stands on the picturesque coastal resort of Ixia, 4 km from Rhodes Town. Guests enjoy direct beach access, and free use of the gym, sauna and steam bath. The sophisticated suites have a living area with a corner sofa bed. The bathroom has a full-length tub, separate shower, and two washbasins. They all feature expansive terraces, several with a private garden or private pool. Guests enjoy 3 outdoor freshwater swimming pools, including one located on the 11th floor with a panoramic view over Ixia bay. The 1,300-square-metre spa provides 14 treatment rooms, including a couple’s room. The Pool Deck restaurant is open for lunch, coffee and snacks, while the Varkarola Taverna serves international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Drinking outlets include a panoramic rooftop bar and a semi-submerged pool bar. Diagoras Airport is 10 km away. The famous Butterfly Valley is 20 km away. On-site parking is free.

name: Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso
description: Surrounded by the enchanting scenery of Athens Riviera, with magnificent sea views, Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso features a state-of-the-art thalassotherapy centre. In a majestic environment surrounded by sea, guests enjoy 3 pools, 4 restaurants and a private beach. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso offers luxurious rooms with furnished sea-facing balconies. The elegantly decorated rooms, are fitted with designer fabrics, oak furniture, paintings and all share stunning views to the sea and the pools. At Papaioannou fine-dining restaurant, guests can indulge in a delicious gastronomy with treasures of the sea and culinary plates accompanied by fine wine and an intimate atmosphere just in front of the sea. At Breakfast the extensive buffet includes a great variety of Greek delicacies as well as European favorites and of course fresh fruits and juices. Casual restaurants include Anemos, with buffets and outdoor seating with views to the pool and sea, the bright and contemporary Atlantis Lounge and A&D bar, both offering light snacks, signature cocktails and live music. Meltemi poolside snack bar offers a shaded seating area that overlooks the pools and is open during the summer period. The Awarded Spa, by World Travel Awards 2014, invites guests to experience a completely different programme of rejuvenation and wellbeing with its programs. Facilities include a 270-m² indoor pool, roman baths, 2 saunas, 2 Turkish baths and a variety of more than 100 facial and body therapies. Active guests will enjoy the flood-lit tennis court and jogging route. Watersports at the property's private beach are also available. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso is 18 km from downtown Athens. Glyfada, famous for shopping and night life, is only 5 minutes away by shuttle bus. Glyfada Golf Club is easily reached at 3 km. The hotel has a 250-car garage.

name: Elounda Gulf Villas
description: Located just a short stroll from the sea in Elounda, the family-run property offers stylish villas with a private pool, and individually decorated luxury suites with Cretan Sea or garden views. Guests enjoy 1 a la carte restaurant. Each elegant suite features a DVD player, fully equipped kitchen with microwave and marble bathroom with hydromassage. They all boast access to the communal swimming pool. Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass have a spacious living room and hot tub. Breakfast is served daily at the main pool terrace. Drinks are served at the stylish bar. BBQ facilities can also be found in the premises of Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass. The property offers free transfer to a private Beach Club, located within a 10-minute drive, while complimentary transfer service to and from the beach is provided. Services like massage in the privacy of the suite or in the Elixir Spa Gallery, and diving lessons in the main pool can be provided upon request. An Elixir Spa Gallery is provided for those who like to work out. Heraklion City is 70 km away. The town of Agios Nikolaos is at a distance of approximately 10 km. Free private parking is possible on site, and transfer from and to Heraklion Airport is offered.

name: Hotel Porto Perissa
address: Porto Perissa Po Box E27, Perissa 847 03
description: Located in Perissa, Hotel Porto Perissa is just 50 metres from the famous black-sand beach and features air-conditioned rooms. It has a swimming pool and a children's swimming pool. The rooms of Porto Perissa are traditionally decorated. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV, hairdryer and safety box and they all have balconies or terraces with pool views. Some units are located at the semi-basement. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served in the dining area. Guests also have access to a lounge with TV, while a library is also at their disposal. Free umbrellas and sunbeds are found by the pool. Free WiFi is provided. The village of Perissa offers many restaurants, bars and shops. A bus stop and super market lie within a short walking distance. Fira, the island’s capital, is within a 15-minute drive from Hotel Perissa. Free private parking is provided in the premises.

name: The Westin Resort, Costa Navarino
description: Beachfront located by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Westin Resort Costa Navarino offers limitless opportunities to energize, relax and transform. Being praised as top in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”, the property is a unique escape for families with countless ways to explore and play; two innovative kids’ clubs, the one-of-a-kind Division 16 youth hub, an impressive Aqua Park, refreshing pools and the endless beach, combine with a wide variety of sports and activities including four signature golf courses, the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, on- and under-water sports, outdoor pursuits to the breath-taking nature and more. Savor nourishing menus and locally sourced dishes in a stunning variety of venues, unwind at the Anazoe Spa with its natural, therapeutic treatments, or discover the region’s culture through a series of authentic experiences.Marriott

name: Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Set right by the sea, 300 metres away from the beach of Parasporos, Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World features a modern spa and a sea-water pool. It offers elegant, 5-star accommodation with free Wi-Fi and large verandas. Decorated in light tones, all units are equipped with a 32” flat-screen, satellite TV, air conditioning and mini fridge. Free toiletries can be found in the bathroom. Start your day with a Greek buffet breakfast including local cheese and sausages, homemade pies and jams, and a variety of fresh fruit. At the bar by the pool, you can enjoy cocktails, fresh juices and snacks. Parikia, the capital and port of Paros, is 3 km away and Paros Airport is 6 km away. A bus stop can be found within 350 metres.

name: Loch Lomond Waterfront Luxury Lodges
description: No description found

name: The Inn on Loch Lomond
description: The main hotel building is now under new ownership (previous owner holding onto Beach House rooms) Changes required to property description as follows: On the banks of Loch Lomond, this Traditional Inn offers classic style rooms within the main building. Guests can enjoy The Inn Bar & Restaurant, along with beautiful loch views. There is Wi-Fi throughout the Main Inn although some public areas are limited. With hand-crafted furniture, each stylish room at The Inn on Loch Lomond is decorated with local materials. Rooms also have a modern, private bathroom. Fresh traditional and local meals are served to eat in or take away from the Restaurant and Bar. The bar also provides a huge range of Scottish ales, lagers, and spirits. There is traditional folk music throughout on Friday and Saturday evenings. The shores of Loch Lomond are less than 5 minutes’ walk away, and The Inn on Loch Lomond can help with arranging watersports or activities nearby. Free parking is available, and Luss is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Linnhe Lochside Holidays
description: Offering a garden with BBQ facilities, Linnhe Lochside Holidays has accommodation with a TV and a DVD player. It is set on the shores of Loch Eil. Chalets and caravans have a kitchen with a microwave and an oven and a private bathroom. With free private parking, Linnhe Lochside Holidays is set in Corpach. Corpach Train Station is less than 5-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Mille Kaleiçi
description: Set in Antalya, within 400 metres of Mermerli Beach and 400 metres of Hadrian's Gate, Hotel Mille Kaleiçi offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. 600 metres from Old City Marina and 3.8 km from Antalya Museum, the hotel features a private beach area. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Antalya Clock Tower. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe. Speaking English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Antalya Aquarium is 7.3 km from Hotel Mille Kaleiçi, while Antalya Aqualand is 8 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Dea Del Hotel
description: No description found

name: Nfk The House Hotel
description: Offering an outdoor pool, NFK The House Hotel is located in Antalya and only 500 metres to the beach. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at on-site bar. NFK The House Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Air-conditioned rooms of NFK The House Hotel include a French balcony. Pool view is offered in certain rooms. Private bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Luggage storage is also available at NFK The House Hotel. Antalya Aquarium is 2 km from NFK The House Hotel, while ANTALYA AQUALAND is 2.6 km from the property. The centre of Antalya is 8 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants. Hadrian's Gate is 9 km away while Kemer is 36 km from the property. Camyuva is 42 km and Tekirova is 52 km. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 21 km from the property.

name: Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel
description: Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Antalya. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. The rooms come with air conditioning, and some units at the hotel have a terrace. At Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel include Mermerli Beach, Old City Marina and Antalya Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Yelken Apart Hotel
description: YELKEN APART HOTEL has mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Antalya, 2 km from 5M Migros. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and minibar are also offered, as well as a kettle. YELKEN APART HOTEL offers a picnic area. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the garden, beside the outdoor swimming pool, on the sun terrace, or in the shared lounge area. Antalya Aquarium is 1.7 km from YELKEN APART HOTEL, while Antalya Aqualand is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: miramor hotel
description: No description found

name: The Marmara Antalya
address: Eski Lara Yolu No. 136 Sirinyali, Antalya 07100
description: Located on the famous Falez Hills with sweeping Mediterranean views, the Marmara Antalya offers a private beach on the Turquoise Coast. Apart from the main building, this hotel features a unique revolving annex that rotates 360 degrees throughout the day. Guests can enjoy the revolving building experience by waking up to views of the pool or the Mediterranean Sea each day. A signature fusion of Turkish and international cuisine can be enjoyed at the Marmara Antalya. Organic and locally sourced products are used to create low-calorie meals and tempting afternoon teas. Guests can enjoy a drink while admiring the view on the garden terrace of the bar. The Marmara Antalya’s rooms have a unique décor in pastel colours. They are spacious and bright, and feature extra-large windows overlooking the sea or the Taurus Mountains. Personal trainers organise your training schedule at Marmara Antalya’s fitness centre. A 5-minute drive from Antalya city centre, The Marmara Antalya is about 7 km from Antalya International Airport.

name: Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort
description: At Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort, we've created a space where modernity and beauty coexist in perfect harmony. Our design is inspired by the elemental forces of earth, fire, water, and air, seamlessly blending ancient and current influences to create a truly unique ambiance.For golfers, our resort is a paradise, with an exceptional 18-hole course designed by Colin Montgomerie, attracting the biggest names in the sport, such as Tiger Woods and Justin Rose. In addition, the golf club offers illuminated evening play, allowing golfers to enjoy the stunning course even after sunset."At Maxx Royal, we understand that true luxury is about more than just external beauty. That's why our deeply personalized service ensures that every guest receives an experience tailored to their specific needs and desires. We believe in creating extraordinary experiences that not only indulge your senses but also make a positive impact on the world we share.From impeccable service to stunning aesthetics, every cornerstone of our hospitality is infused with a human-centered commitment to excellence. We're proud to weave sustainable practices throughout our resort, ensuring that your stay with us is not only unforgettable but also mindful of the planet we call home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Amon Hotels Belek
address: Kadriye Mah. Deniz Cad. No 119/1, Antalya 07525
description: Amon Hotels Belek - Adult Only has a fitness centre, garden, a restaurant and bar in Belek. Among the facilities at this property are a tour desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, nightclub and room service. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Amon Hotels Belek - Adult Only have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units have a safety deposit box. The daily breakfast offers continental, Asian or vegetarian options. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna and a Turkish bath. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Russian, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Kadriye Beach is 2.6 km from Amon Hotels Belek - Adult Only, while The Land of Legends Theme Park is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 30 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum
description: Located in Akyarlar, 400 metres from Aspat Beach, Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features a sauna and an ATM. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with sea views. At Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a halal or gluten-free breakfast. Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre. Karaincir Beach is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Akyarlar Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 60 km from Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum.

name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Bodrum
address: Kavakli Sarnic Cad., 1531 Sok No: 4, Bodrum 48470
description: The 100 percent Non-Smoking Hotel is located 4 km from the center of Bodrum, on hill in view of Kos Island. The hotel has leisure facilities such as including outdoor and indoor pools, sauna, steam bath, Turkish bath, squash, tennis court, fitness including spinning plates etc. We have free seasonal shuttle service to the beach from May 15 - September 30. P of the rooms has a spectacular sea view. We have two restaurants and two bars. You can find the most famous and delicious sushi Restaurant which called "The Club" in Hotel. There is free high speed wireless internet in all rooms and public areas. The Hotel has also meeting and banquet facilities up to 500 pax with a amazing view at foyer.Wyndham

name: Merih Hotel
address: Kumbahce Mah, Ataturk Cad, No 94, Bodrum 48400
description: Attractively located in the centre of Bodrum City, merih butik hotel features air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a garden. 600 metres from Akkan Beach and 1.4 km from Bodrum Castle, the property provides a bar and barbecue facilities. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available each morning at merih butik hotel. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at merih butik hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bodrum City, like cycling. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Bodrum Bar Street, Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology and Bodrum Municipality Bus Station. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 40 km from merih butik hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isil Club Resort
description: Located in Torba, 10 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking resort features a sauna and nightclub. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and canoeing. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English and Turkish. Bodrum Municipality Bus Station is 8.4 km from DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort, while Bodrum Bar Street is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 33 km from the resort.

name: Mirada Exclusive Bodrum
address: Asarlik Mevkii Turkuaz Sk No 8-10 Bodrum, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, 1.1 km from Bitez Beach, Mirada Exclusive Bodrum provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, entertainment staff and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mirada Exclusive Bodrum each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Mirada Exclusive Bodrum offers a terrace. Gumbet Beach is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Mor Plaj is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Mirada Exclusive Bodrum.

name: Rammos Hotel
address: Gazi Mustafa Kemal Bulvarı No: 327 B Turgutreis / Bodrum / Muğla, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 700 metres from Fener Beach, Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel has a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, vegetarian or vegan options. The accommodation offers a spa centre. Soytas Beach is 2.5 km from Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 63 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Bodrum
description: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa in Bodrum has 84 rooms, including 67 rooms, 9 suites, 6 One-Bedroom Residences, 1 Three-Bedroom Residence and a Caresse King Villa. All rooms offer excellent amenities, such as modern technology and Marriott's Signature Luxury Collection Beds. Every guest at the Caresse Luxury Collection Resort & Spa can experience the captivating view of the Aegean Sea, since each room has its own private terrace or balcony. Luxury extends to a stylish blend of chic furnishings and tasteful bathrooms, that stand as the epitome of lavish comfort. Relax, unwind and allow your senses to fully embrace the unique tranquility of Bodrum. In addition to this luxurious experience, our discreet and attentive guest assistant is always on hand to grant your every wish.Marriott

name: Pudra Suites Bodrum
address: Kumbahce Mah, Ataturk Cad No100, Bodrum 48400
description: Rooms Stay in one of 38 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Property Location A stay at Pudra Hotel places you in the heart of Bodrum, just a 4-minute walk from Bodrum Beach and within a 5-minute drive of Bodrum Castle. This hotel is 1 mi (1.6 km) from Bodrum Marina and 4.7 mi (7.5 km) from Bitez Beach. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. name: Aspat Butik Hotel - Beach Restaurant
description: No description found

name: Akana Cennet Koyu Bodrum
description: Set in Bodrum Peninsula, 20 km from Bodrum Castle, Akana Cennet Koyu Bodrum offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Akana Cennet Koyu Bodrum. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 20 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 46 km from Akana Cennet Koyu Bodrum, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Marmara Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Yokusbasi Mah. Suluhasan Cad. No:18, Bodrum 48400
description: Set on a hilltop, this design hotel offers a free-form outdoor pool with 180° views of Bodrum Bay and Kos Island. It has a spa and a fitness centre, and rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Marmara Bodrum features a collection of statues created by painter and sculptor Mevlut Akyildiz. The hotel's transparent toilet doors are designed by French architect Christian Allart. All rooms at Marmara Bodrum have luxury bedding and are fitted with ornate wooden furniture. Each one has air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a private balcony or terrace, some of which overlook the sea. The Marmara Bodrum welcomes its guests on the private beach all summer long. Free beach shuttle service is available on the dates when the beach is open. A mix of international and Turkish items including fresh bread and local cheese are served for the buffet breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served a-la-carte style. Guests can also relax with a glass of wine and enjoy sunset views from the pool’s deck chairs. The aduly only Marmara Bodrum is 15 minutes’ drive from Bodrum Milas Airport. Bodrum Marina is a 2-minute drive away, and Bodrum Castle is 1 km from the hotel. Free parking is available on site. The Marmara Beach invites their guests from 25 May till 15 September. Free shuttle service to the beach is available during the day.

name: Flora Hotel Bodrum
description: Flora Hotel is a beachfront complex surrounded by lush gardens, 100 metres from the centre of Gumbet and 2 km from Bodrum city centre. The complex is spread around the large pool area where you can relax with a drink from the bar and soak up the sun. Flora Hotel also has à la carte restaurants. Children will appreciate the hotel's games room, playground and table tennis facilities. All the rooms of Flora Hotel have garden or pool view and come with air conditioning, balcony and satellite TV. Services such as child minding, car rental and tour desk are designed to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Free private parking and free Wi-Fi are also available to all guests.

name: The Bodrum EDITION
address: Dirmil Mahallesi, Balyek Cd. No 5a, Bodrum 48990
description: Enjoy luxury living at The Bodrum EDITION. Set on the Turkish Riviera, our boutique hotel offers an inspiring location to explore Turkey. This beachfront hotel in Bodrum offers easy access to numerous watersports, places to explore such as Yalikavak Marina, Yalikavak Market and Bodrum Amphitheatre, as well as enticing shops and restaurants. The hotel has 108 guest rooms, lofts, suites and villas with custom furnishings, indulgent bedding and signature linens, ergonomic workstations, free Wi-Fi. Spacious bathrooms include oversized tubs, decadent monsoon rain showerheads and Le Labo bath products. Some accommodations boast gardens, terraces and private pools. Indulge in our creative restaurants, including BRAVA by Diego Munoz, and socialize at Discetto. Take a dip into our infinity pool, work out in the modern gym or rejuvenate at our replenishing hotel spa. For your wedding in Bodrum, meetings or social celebrations, choose from our 12 light-filled venues, with splendid views of the Aegean Sea.Marriott

name: Inone Mucho Selection Hotel
address: Gümbet Mah. Kaşif Ertekin Sok. No.12/7, Bodrum 48400
description: Set in Çırkan, 600 metres from Gumbet Beach, INONE MUCHO SELECTION HOTEL offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. 2.2 km from Bitez Beach and 2.4 km from Bardakci Bay Beach, the property features a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 3.4 km from INONE MUCHO SELECTION HOTEL, while Myndus Gate is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 44 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Divan Bodrum - Special Class
description: Situated in Golturkbuku, Divan Bodrum offers elegant 5-star accommodation, as well as a private beach and a swimming pool. It also provides complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 60 rooms and has been recently refurbished. It provides meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception, as well as a basketball court. The rooms are air conditioned and include a pillow menu, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms designed for families. Those staying at Divan Bodrum can enjoy a beverage at Sahil Bar, before enjoying a meal at Taşev. Divan Bodrum offers private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Bodrum and Yalikavak are also just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Maxx Royal Bodrum
address: Gölköy Mah 312 Sk No 3 Bodrum /Mugla No 3, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.3 km from Akkan Beach, Maxx Royal Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a hammam. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Maxx Royal Bodrum provides some rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a patio. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Maxx Royal Bodrum can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. The property has an in-house hot spring bath, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Maxx Royal Bodrum include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay
address: Kizilagac Koyu Gerenkuyu Mevkii Yaliciftlik, Bodrum 48400
description: Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum enjoys a quiet location, overlooking Gokova Bay. It provides luxury rooms with private balconies, 2 swimming pools, restaurants with sea views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel also has a blue-flagged private sandy beach. The hotel offers special services for guests travelling with their children. Specifically-designed "Kids Inclusive" services include fun and educational activities for younger guests. You can start the day with daily buffet breakfast at Olive Restaurant with soft drinks. The non-smoking rooms at the Kempinski Hotel feature stylish furnishings and modern décor. Each room has its own seating area, satellite TV and a spacious bathroom. Some rooms enjoy panoramic views over the Aegean Sea. The exclusive spa offers East Asian treatments and massages. The Hotel Kempinski Bodrum also provides a sauna, fitness centre and Turkish bath. Guests can take diving courses or enjoy fishing tours and parasailing. Other water sport activities include wake board and water ski, windsurfing and water buggy. All activities incur a surcharge. Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum is conveniently located a 20-minute drive from The Mausoleum of Halikarnassus, Greek Amphitheater and Bodrum Castle. Bodrum Airport is 35 km away. Free valet parking and a ticket service are available.

name: Mett Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum
description: Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a year-round outdoor pool and an indoor pool, METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum offers a spa centre, sauna, hammam and a private beach area. Free private parking is available on site. Each room has a flat-screen TV. Certain units feature a seating area where you can relax and a terrace or a balcony. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a bidet. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is provided in all rooms. You can start the day with A La Carte breakfast. The on-site 4 à la carte restaurants offer a variety of delicacies for the guests to enjoy. Guests can also enjoy refreshments from two bars. You will find a 24-hour front desk. The resort also offers car hire. Bodrum Castle is 3 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas- Bodrum Airport, 39 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum.

name: Root Redrock Yalikavak
description: Set in Bodrum City, Root Redrock Yalıkavak offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a private beach area and pool with a view. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. The wellness area at the villa is comprised of a hammam, a spa facilities and a fitness room. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Root Redrock Yalıkavak. Yalikavak Public Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 58 km from Root Redrock Yalıkavak, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Doria Hotel Bodrum
description: Doria Hotel Bodrum, situated in a dramatic hilltop location inBitez, is the hippest boutique hotel in this historiconce-upon-a-time fishing village that has evolved into a jetsetheaven. The open and airy hotel features an extensivecollection of contemporary art as well as innovative cuisineand spectacular views of the Aegean, all just 10 minutes drivefrom vibrant Bodrum and an easy half-hour trip from theMilas-Bodrum International Airport. While you are soakingup the stunning views and being caressed by the Bodrum sun,you will also want to set out on an exploration of thePeninsulas historic and natural treasures, including theMausoleum, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World,and the Crusader Castle of Saint Peter, now home to theMuseum of Underwater Archaeology.Dining and Entertainment at BluCombining the regions exceptional freshproduce with its equally superior olive oil,adding the catch of the day from Gumbet Bayand Bodrum, Blu by Doria Hotel Bodrumoffers contemporary Mediterranean cuisine.The Club House serves a combination ofsnacks and refreshments and the poolsidebar is the perfect place to wind down with atempting cocktail as the sun sets overGumbet Bay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Khai Hotel Bodrum
address: Yahsi Mahallesi, Yali Caddesi No:26, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, a few steps from Yahsi Beach, KHAI HOTEL BODRUM features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 600 metres from Ortakent Plaj, 9.3 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and 8.5 km from Myndus Gate. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms will provide guests with a minibar. Pedasa Antique City is 8.6 km from KHAI HOTEL BODRUM, while Bodrum Windmills is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: No 81 Hotel
address: Kelesharimi Mevkii. Mimoza Sk. No:10, Bodrum
description: Overlooking the marina and Aegean Sea, this hotel is located in Bodrum Golturkbuku. It boasts a spacious seaside sun deck and has and a terrace with sun loungers. Rooms at the No81 Hotel have stylish modern furnishings and balconies with panoramic views. They come equipped satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have hardwood floors and a large work desk. Daze Restaurant serves traditional breakfast with coffee, omelette and it also offers dinner. You can sample cocktails and lighter fare from the beach bar. Daze turns into a night club in the evening, which serves special cocktails. No 81 guests can visit the fitness centre. There hotel’s tour desk assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. No81 Hotel is located 29 km from Milas Airport. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking along with valet service.

name: Susona Bodrum, LXR Hotels & Resorts
address: Torba district Kaynar street No15, Bodrum 48420
description: Susona Bodrum lies in the heart of Torba District, Turkiye overlooking the Aegean Sea. The hotel offers on-site dining, meeting space, and a full-service spa. The refined resort also features a tennis court, two pools, and four restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy a spacious green landscape, coastal views, and a private beach with a sun deck. Find the ultimate relaxation in one of the poolside and beachside cabanas. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free WiFi, a mini-bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Upgrade to a suite for more space to work and relax. Nearby attractions include wine tasting and vineyard visits, Etrim Carpet Village, the ancient city of Bodrum, and the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus.Hilton

name: Family Life Bodrum Imperial Hotel
description: Set in Akyarlar, 17 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Kairaba Bodrum Imperial every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers a hammam. You can play billiards, darts and mini-golf at the hotel, and car hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Turkish. Bodrum Windmills is 14 km from Kairaba Bodrum Imperial, while Pedasa Antique City is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 57 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Centro Bodrum
description: Hotel Centro Bodrum is conveniently located in the popular Eskicesme area. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including private beach, outdoor pool, children's playground, pool (kids). Hotel Centro Bodrum is an excellent choice from which to explore Bodrum or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Labranda Tmt Bodrum
description: Labranda TMT Bodrum Resort is conveniently located in the popular Kumbahce area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, babysitting, restaurant, laundry service. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find flat screen television, bathroom phone, mirror, internet access wireless, air conditioning. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Labranda TMT Bodrum Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Bodrum.priceline.com

name: Mucho Butik Otel
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 800 metres from Bodrum Castle, Mucho Boutique Hotel features accommodation with a restaurant(only breakfast) and bar. Hotel provide breakfast between 09:-11:00 o'clock at the terrace restaurant. guest can use noxy restourant beach(per person 250TL per day). Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, some rooms include a balcony. At Mucho Boutique Hotel, rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Popular points of interest near Mucho Boutique Hotel include Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, Bodrum Municipality Bus Station and Bodrum Bar Street. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 31 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Peda Sun Club Hotel
description: Guests of this hotel will appreciate the seclusion of its private beach and on-site spa and wellness center, all just a short car ride from the center of Bodrum. It also offers a Turkish steam bath and an outdoor pool. This 3-star hotel provides a safe, a 24-hour reception and a sun deck. Honeymoon suites are available for those looking for some added luxury. Rooms feature an in-room closet, a private bathroom and a refrigerator. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, a shower and cable/satellite channels. For those wanting to stay nearby, the elegant restaurant is a convenient dining option, providing a range of international cuisine. Hotel Sun Club provides an ideal place to discover Bodrum Castle and Mausoleum at Halicarnassus, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Bodrum Beach is only a short car ride from the hotel.HotelsCombined

name: Gumbet Cove Hotel
address: Adnan Menderes Cad. M. Kasif Ertekin Sk. 4, Bodrum 48200
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 46 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, a picnic area, and barbecue grills. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. Property Location With a stay at Gümbet Cove Hotel in Bodrum (Bodrum City Center), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Bodrum Beach and WOW Beach. This beach hotel is 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Bitez Beach and 1.9 mi (3 km) from Bodrum Marina. Dining At Gümbet Cove Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the beach bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The following facilities or services will be unavailable from January 1 2022 to March 1 2022 (dates subject to change): Dining venue(s) The property is closed between June 19 and September 30. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for buffet breakfast: TRY 100 for adults and TRY 30 for children (approximately) Pet fee: TRY 100 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:30 PM Pets Pets allowed Only dogs and cats are allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No elevators Children not allowed Property is cleaned with disinfectant Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safe Tourism Certification Program (Turkey) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels

name: Blue Bay Hotel
description: Blue Bay Beach Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Bitez. A few steps from Bitez Beach and 1.2 km from Mor Plaj, the hotel features a private beach area. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Blue Bay Beach Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a halal breakfast. Activities such as hiking, snorkelling, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Yeşil Plaj Beach is 2 km from Blue Bay Beach Hotel, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 5.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: west coast boutique hotel
address: Turgut Özal Caddesi turgutreis mah no 409, Bodrum 48400
description: West coast boutique hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Bodrum City. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a private beach area. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Each room includes a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a patio and others also provide guests with city views. At west coast boutique hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. West coast boutique hotel offers a hot tub. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Farsi at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Soytas Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Fener Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 61 km from west coast boutique hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bella Mila Suit Otel
description: Providing quiet street views and free WiFi, Bella Mila Suit Otel provides accommodation well located in the centre of Bodrum City, within a short distance of Akkan Beach, Bodrum Castle and Bodrum Marina Yacht Club. Offering a terrace with views of the garden and city, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV and kitchenette. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Bella Mila Suit Otel include Bodrum Bar Street, Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology and Bodrum Municipality Bus Station. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 40 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: B&C Hotel
description: Located in Atakum, 1.7 km from Atakum Sahil Beach, B&C HOTEL provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 5 km from Mayis University. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The units include a safety deposit box. A halal breakfast is available daily at the hotel. The area is popular for fishing and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Denizkizi Park is 5.8 km from B&C HOTEL, while Ondokuz Mayıs University is 6.7 km away. The nearest airport is Samsun Çarşamba Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Bohemians
address: Modranská 51, Praha 4, Podolí, 147 00 Prague, Prague Region
description: Situated on the riverfront, Hotel Bohemians is just 10 minutes by tram from the center. It offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi. Bohemians Hotel is in a peaceful green area and all rooms have en suite bathroom and satellite TV. Guarded private parking is available on site. There is a public bath just 500 metres from the hotel, which features indoor and outdoor swimming pools, steam room and sauna. Zlute Lazne, an outdoor bathing and sports centre, is just 200 metres from Hotel Bohemians and it also offers several bars and terraces.

name: Dubina
description: Situated in Kyselka and with Mill Colonnade reachable within 14 km, Dubina features a tour desk, allergy-free rooms, a private beach area, free WiFithroughout the property and water sports facilities. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. There is a restaurant serving European cuisine, and free private parking is available. At the guest house, each room has a desk. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. At Dubina each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Dubina offers an outdoor fireplace. Activities such as skiing, cycling, hiking can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Market Colonnade is 14 km from the guest house, while Hot Spring is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 10 km from Dubina.

name: Hotel Schweizerhof Zürich
description: The Hotel Schweizerhof Zürich is located opposite the main station at the beginning of the Bahnhofstrasse and offers soundproofed rooms with electrically adjustable beds and free high-speed WiFi. The Schweizerhof's French restaurant 'La Soupière' offers you delicious seasonal cuisine and Swiss specialities made of market-fresh ingredients. The Café Gourmet and its caviar boutique serves fine antipasti, salads, pastry and much more. The Schweizerhof Bar is famous for its wide selection of whiskies and local and international beers. You enjoy free access to the close by Holmes Place Fitness & Spa. The Schweizerhof Zürich hotel is only a 15-minute walk away from Lake Zurich and only a 10-minute train ride from the international airport Zurich-Kloten.

name: Hotel Hermitage
description: Situated on the shores of Lake Lucerne, the Hermitage stands alone, but is still very close to the busy centre of Lucerne. All the rooms, restaurants and function rooms look out onto the lake and to the mountains beyond. Guests are also welcome to relax on the loungers scattered underneath the trees in the park. Furthermore, the hotel offers you different outdoor activities, a gym and a wellness corner.iHotelier/iStay

name: Romantik Hotel Beau Rivage
