description: Newly renovated in 2014, the Hotel Beau Rivage Weggis is located right on the shore of Lake Lucerne. It offers a restaurant with a lakeside terrace, free parking and free WiFi, and from March to October an outdoor pool and a spa centre are available. Our Hotel has no aircondtion From every room in the Hotel Beau Rivage you can enjoy panoramic lake or mountain views. The seasonal heated outdoor pool (26 °C) is open between mid March and mid October. The sunbathing lawn, and the wellness centre including a steam bath and a hot tub invite you to unwind. The restaurant serves fine Italian and international cuisine including fish specialities.

name: See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi
description: The See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi in Weggis is located right on the shore of Lake Lucerne. It offers panoramic lake views, indoor and outdoor pools and free parking. All of the spacious rooms and apartments have a cable TV and a balcony. The 1500 m² spa area include various steam baths and saunas, a Laconium and private spa suites. Fine Swiss and international cuisine and a wide range of wines are served in the restaurant of the See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi.

name: Hotel Terrasse am See
description: Hotel Terrasse am See is situated on the banks of Lake Lucerne, at the steamboat landing stage and the Rigi Mountain Railway Station in Vitznau. The historic hotel was opened in 1873 and dates from the earliest days of the railway service to Mount Rigi. Free Wi-Fi is featured throughout the property. The hotel celebrates Swiss traditions and each floor of the hotel tells a story of the railway and the house. The uniquely decorated en-suite rooms at the Hotel Terrasse am See are furnished in historic style with carefully restored pieces of period furniture and old parquet floors. They feature seating areas, wired internet access as well as free WI-Fi, and some of them have a balcony. The property boasts a private lakeshore with beautiful sunset views, a sunny terrace and a restaurant serving fresh Swiss cuisine and Swiss wines from each of the 26 Cantons. The bistro serves breakfasts as well as lunches and dinners. A limited number of private parking spaces is available and paid public parking can be found in the vicinity.

name: Seehof Hotel Du Lac
description: The Seehof du Lac is situated in the centre of Weggis and only 25 km from Luzern, on one of the loveliest spots on Lake Lucerne. Guests can enjoy a large lakeside lounge with direct lake access. WiFi is provided free of charge throughout the property.

name: Campus Hotel Hertenstein
description: Located on a peninsula on the shores of Lake Lucerne and directly at the boat stop, Campus Hotel Hertenstein opened its doors in 2013 and features en-suite rooms with balcony and beautiful views of the lake, the Central Swiss Mountains or the Hertenstein Peninsula. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar with non-alcoholic beverages, a desk and a bathroom with shower or bath tub. Breakfast is available every morning. The hotel also provides a sauna, a small fitness room, a private boat jetty, 12 meeting rooms and free WiFi in the entire property. The bus stop for the Lido bus is located right in front of the house, a public bus stop is 2 km away and the town of Weggis is 2.5 km away. Lucerne can be reached within 30 minutes by car or ship.

name: Seehotel Kastanienbaum
description: Seehotel Kastanienbaum welcomes you on the quiet Horw peninsula, a 15-minute drive from the old town of Lucerne. Look forward to a breathtaking view over Lake Lucerne and the mountain panorama of Central Switzerland. In addition, a private beach with sunbathing lawn and a heated outdoor pool await you during the summer months. Start the day with a rich breakfast. In the lakeside restaurant and in summer also on the lakeside terrace, regional delicacies and newly interpreted classics are served - with a grandiose view. Upon arrival, you will receive a free ticket for public transportation in the city of Lucerne. You can easily reach the center of Lucerne by boat or public bus. The boat station and the bus stop are located directly at the hotel.

name: Hotel Central Am See - Beau Rivage Collection
description: This 3-star superior hotel enjoys a quiet yet central location right on the banks of Lake Lucerne in Weggis. Newly renovated in 2014, it offers a panoramic outdoor pool and provides lake and mountain views from most rooms. Free WiFi is available. Fine Swiss and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the restaurant, in the winter garden or on the garden terrace of the Hotel Central Am See. From the garden with the heated swimming pool, sun loungers and the hotel's own boat moorings, you have direct access to the lake.

name: Seehotel Gotthard
description: The family-run Seehotel Gotthard in Weggis on the shore of Lake Lucerne, 25 km from Lucerne, offers 2 restaurants, a pizzeria, a bistro and rooms with scenic views and free WiFi. In the summer months guest enjoy free access to the heated outdoor pool of the neightbouring hotel Beau Rivage. During the warmer months you can enjoy your breakfast on the outdoor terrace. The harbour is a 3-minute walk away.

name: Villa Principe Leopoldo
description: Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group can be found amid a large park above Lugano, offering panoramic views of Lake Lugano and the mountains, and featuring leisure, sport and wellness facilities, as well as exquisite dining options. WiFi is available for free. A Member of Relais & Chateaux, Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is a harmonious blend of Italian charm and Swiss excellence. The historical villa, once a prince's residence, provides views of the lake and the garden, and the nearby park The DOT SPA offers a relaxing ambience made with personalised treatments based on the Villa Principe's own top-quality cosmetic line. Hot tub, sauna and steam bath facilities are also featured. The Principe Leopoldo Restaurant received excellent reviews in the most important international guides. The Piano Bar & Lounge offers an exclusive selection of cocktails and wines, champagne and malt whiskies, all accompanied by live music. A breakfast room is located in each building. The spacious and stylishly decorated guest rooms are all air-conditioned. Bathrobes and slippers can be found in the luxurious bathrooms. Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is 2 km from the city centre of Lugano. Private outdoor parking is available on site for free. Garage parking is possible at an additional cost. A charging station for electric and Tesla vehicles is available on site.

name: Belvédère Strandhotel
description: Belvédère Strandhotel is a 4-star superior hotel in Spiez, right on the shore of Lake Thun. It includes a spa area, an outdoor pool, a private beach, and a gourmet restaurant overlooking the lake. The elegant rooms at the Strandhotel Belvédère feature a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar, a Nespresso coffee machine, and a bathroom. Bern can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

name: Eventhotel Pyramide
description: Directly opposite the SCS, Austria’s largest shopping centre, Eventhotel Pyramide features a large spa and recreation area with indoor and outdoor pools and free access for guests. Free WiFi is available in public areas and some rooms. The air-conditioned rooms offer a safe, minibar, satellite TV, and bathroom with a hairdryer. Featuring a 42-metre pyramid, which hosts an event centre for up to 4,000 people, Eventhotel is surrounded by 45,000 m² of greenery. The restaurant includes a garden and a bar with a terrace. An 18-hole golf course in Brunn am Gebirge is only 5-minute drive away and offers discounted green fees to guests of Eventhotel Pyramide. The Badener Bahn railway line stops right in front of Hotel Pyramide and takes you to Vienna’s State Opera, as well as to the centre of Baden, within 25 minutes. Free parking is possible on site. The A2, A21 and A23 motorways can be reached within a 5-minute drive.

name: Hotel Gabi
description: Located in Wals on the green outskirts of Salzburg, Hotel Gabi has an outdoor pool and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a balcony. Parking is free of charge. Hotel Gabi features a spa area with a sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a modern fitness room. A rich breakfast buffet with many regional products is served in the morning. In summer, guests can have breakfast on the terrace and enjoy the views of the Untersberg Mountain. A children’s playground is only a few steps away from Hotel Gabi. All rooms feature air conditioning and guests can use the indoor pool. Additionally, a private beach is available 500 metres away. The centre of Salzburg, the airport, and the motorways can be reached in a few minutes’ drive from Hotel Gabi.

name: Hallstatt Hideaway - Adults only
description: No description found

name: Hotel Bürglstein
address: Schwarzenbach 19, 5360 Sankt Wolfgang im Salzkammergut, Oberosterreich
description: Situated 2.5 km from the centre of Sankt Wolfgang and 400 metres from the beach at Lake Wolfgang, which guests can use for free, the smallest 4-star hotel at Lake Wolfgang offers free WiFi, a spa area, and a restaurant with a beer garden. Garage parking is possible on site. The modern rooms and suites at Hotel Bürglstein offer lake or mountain views, a flat-screen satellite TV, parquet floors, and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The Bürglstein Hotel’s restaurant serves Austrian cuisine prepared with seasonal products, as well as a wide range of fine wines, brandies and organic juices. The 100m² large spa area includes a Finnish sauna, and infrared cabin and a relaxation room. A storage room for skis and bicycles, as well as free outdoor parking spaces are available on site. Garage parking spaces are available at a surcharge. Hiking trails start right outside, and a large children's playground is only 50 metres away. There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel. Bad Ischl is only 12 km away, and it is 40 km to Salzburg. Both cities can be reached by an hourly bus connection. At a surcharge, the hotel's own taxi and shuttle service takes guest to the train station and to Salzburg Airport.

name: Hotel Rösch
description: Hotel Rösch is located in green surroundings, 1 km from Lake Wörthersee and the Alpen-Adria University. It offers free WiFi, free parking, a restaurant, and a spa area. You can easily reach the centre of Klagenfurt, the university and the train station from the bus stop right in front of the Hotel Rösch. The spacious rooms at the Rösch Hotel have cable TV and a private bathroom. Some also feature a balcony. In summer the hotel's own private beach, located on the shore of a small river close to the lake, is available to hotel guests free of charge. A bath house and a free pedalo rental are located there. The restaurant serves seasonal delicacies and steak specialities. The spa centre features a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, infrared cabins, a sun bed, a large relaxation room, and a garden. In summer the hotel's own private beach "(2-minute walking distance away)".

name: Flairhotel am Wörthersee
description: Directly located on the quiet southern shore of Lake Wörthersee, 3.5 km from the centre of Velden, the Flairhotel features a private beach with deck chairs and sunshades, an indoor pool with a conservatory, and free WiFi access in the entire property. The Flairhotel’s rooms offer a full HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe, and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. All rooms are accessible by lift. Spa facilities include a combined Finnish and bio sauna and an infrared cabin. Massages are available on request and should to be ordered in advance. The Kerzenstüberl restaurant serves Austrian and international cuisine, as well as a rich breakfast buffet featuring organic products. In fine weather, meals are served on the large terrace overlooking the lake. At the hotel, guests can rent a selection of different bicycles for exploring the surrounding lake district. Electric bikes and mountain bikes are also available. Free private parking is available at Flairhotel am Wörthersee. The Wörthersee Plus Card, offering various discounts in the region, is included in the rate.

name: The Unbound
address: Tom Schreursweg 40, 1076 HR Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Set in Amsterdam, 8.1 km from Anne Frank House, The Unbound Amsterdam offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 8.6 km from Royal Palace Amsterdam. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. All rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At The Unbound Amsterdam every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Leidseplein is 8.8 km from The Unbound Amsterdam, while Van Gogh Museum is 8.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin
address: Kon. Astrid Boulevard 5, 2200 AB Noordwijk, Zuid-Holland
description: Facing the beachfront, Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin offers 5-star accommodation in Noordwijk aan Zee and features a fitness centre, garden and shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Noordwijk aan Zee Beach is 200 metres from Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin, while Keukenhof is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Amsterdam Beach Hotel
description: Amsterdam Beach Hotel is located in the centre of Zandvoort, near shops and restaurants and opposite the casino. The beach can be found across this internationally orientated hotel. All rooms have a private bathroom and comfortable beds, some rooms have a balcony and a sea view. The train station is at walking distance from Amsterdam Beach Hotel. From here, you can easily reach Haarlem and Amsterdam. The Zandvoort Circuit is also at walking distance.

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Secrets The Vine Cancun Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 14.5, Zona Hotelera, Zona Hotelera Cancun Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Nizuc Resort and Spa
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 21 Punta Nizuc, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, Nizuc Resort & Spa is located on the secluded Punta Nizuc and features an outdoor pool, private dock and spa. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available to guests. The air-conditioned rooms offer Nespresso coffee makers and flat-screen TVs. The spacious bathrooms feature a bath tubs with rainfall showers. The 6 on-site restaurants serve modern Mexican dishes, Peruvian ceviches as well as Asian and Mediterranean food. Tours and activities can be arranged by the concierge. Nizuc Resort & Spa has event and meeting facilities. Guests can enjoy a variety of massages or treatments in the luxurious on-site spa. The Nizuc Thermal Experience is a feast to awaken the senses through a guided circuit of hydrotherapy. Laguna Nichupté can be reached 6.9 km. Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

name: Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km.12.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

name: Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa - All Inclusive
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km. 8.5 Lote B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Punta Blanca Beach House
address: Fraccionamiento Santa Fatima Manzana 3, Lote 1, Municipio Isla Mujeres, Zona Continental, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Costa Mujeres, 19 km from Cancun Bus Station, Punta Blanca Beach House features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Punta Blanca Beach House provides some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Punta Blanca Beach House. Cancun Government Palace is 20 km from the hotel, while Beto Avila Stadium is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 36 km from Punta Blanca Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort Adults Only
address: Lote Rth-7-PM-II, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning, adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. Ticket Package

name: SLS Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan km 1 Zona Turistica Puerto Cancun Lote 1 02 Uc 1 Mz 27, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring 45 suites, world class décor, unforgettable dining and nightlife experiences. World Class author Restaurant Leynia. Vibrant Beach Club with the most breathtaking frontbeach in Cancun. Exclusive access to the sbe Collection and global concierge. This unprecedented destination awaits to amaze you.accorhotels.com

name: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres
address: Carr Punta Sam - Isla Blanca,Mz 2, Lt 10, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Intercontinental Presidente Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from one of our 300 equipped rooms and suites in the best 5 star hotel in Cancun. Located in the hotel zone and the best beach in Cancun, a wide beach with a calm sea and no waves. 15 minutes from the city and nightlife and 30 minutes from the airport. Relax in our spa in a peaceful environment while your children have fun in our kids club with professional staff.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Vislow Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include designer toiletries, laundry facilities, a freezer, and towels.Expedia

name: Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort
description: Located a picturesque setting of Augustów overlooking Lake Necko, Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort offers plenty of activities to make use of its beautiful surroundings. It offers rooms with free wireless internet access. Each of the rooms at Hotel Warszawa has modern amenities, including satellite TV. Each also has a spacious bathroom with a shower. At guests’ request, a children’s bathtub can be added to the room. Guests will enjoy a professional treatment at Hotel Warszawa’s spa centre with massages. Breakfast can be served in the hotel restaurant or brought to the room at the time of choosing. Restaurant also offers international cuisine. Restaurant boasts a wonderful panorama of Lake Necko from an observation deck. Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort has a quiet, private beach. Guests can rent a bike and explore the beautiful forest of Augustów or tour the banks of Netta River. Necko Lake also has watersports facilities, like water skis. You can enjoy a boat trip or a gondola.

name: Przystan Hotel&spa
description: Przystań Hotel&Spa is located by Lake Ukiel in Olsztyn. It offers a free Wellness Centre, which features a swimming pool, saunas, a hot tub and a gym, Free WiFi access is available. Each room here is air conditioned and will provide you with a TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathrooms come with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box, linen and towels. Guests can benefit from a number of facilities, such as a private beach area and a business centre. Cycling and water sports are some of the activities that can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings. The hotel restaurant serves Asian cuisine, while the well-known Przystań restaurant next door serves regional specialities. Przystań Hotel&Spa is located 3 km from the Olsztyn Old Town and 4.6 km from the Olsztyn Planetarium.

name: Hotel Robert's Port
description: Located in a quiet place in the beautiful Masurian Lake District, the 4-star Hotel Robert's Port offers free access to an indoor pool, a kids' pool and saunas. Rooms are carpeted, air-conditioned and classically decorated. There is a TV with satellite channels, air-condition and a refrigerator in each room. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel has a 24/7 reception. There are two hotel restaurants, where guests can enjoy Polish and international cuisine, and a patio café. The property also features a garden, gym and fitness room. Guests can rent out bicycles, Nordic walking sticks or angling equipment. Kayaks, pedalos and boats are also available. The youngest guests can enjoy themselves in the kids' club, vide games room and a safe outdoor playground. Hot tub and spa treatments for body and face are available at a surcharge. The popular Mikołajki resort is 4 km away and Hotel Robert’s Port is located right on the Tałty Lake.

name: Sheraton Sopot Hotel
description: Sheraton Sopot Hotel is a 5 star spa hotel located, right at the beach, next to the longest wooden pier in Europe and just 30 minutes away from Gdansk city center and the airport. Our spa hotel offers 189 elegant rooms and renovated suites. The Sheraton Sopot hotel is the ideal destination for every occasion, from family getaways to business stays. Our large Conference Center with 3000 square meters of space divided between 14 conference rooms and 2 foyers can accommodate up to 1100 delegates. After a day of the conference or an active family day out the guests can relax in Sheraton Sopot Spa, which includes a fitness center, swimming pool, Spa Experience Zone with a wide range of saunas, and treatment rooms.Marriott

name: Liss Ard Estate
description: Liss Ard Estate, a member of Irelands prestigious Blue Book, and a AA awarded 5 Star Georgian Country Manor.Escape to 163 acres of pristine nature with manicured gardens, a 40 acre private lake and James Turrells renowned Irish Sky Garden. The Estate features 26 unique guest rooms in the heart of West Cork, the culinary capital of Ireland. Our 26 guest rooms all include an ensuite and are located in the Manor, its adjacent Mews and the Lake House. In 2021 2022 the Estate underwent an extensive renovation which fully renovated all guest rooms and common areas. James Turrells The Irish Sky Garden For over half a century, the internationally renowned landscape artist James Turrell has worked directly with light and space to create artworks that engage viewers with the limits and wonder of human perception. New Yorker critic Calvin Tompkins writes, His work is not about light, or a record of light; it is light the physical presence of light made manifest in sensory form.Our 2 AA Rosette Awarded Restaurant GardenAll dishes are inspired by the seasons and harvested from the garden and coupled with the best local meat, fish and game to bring you a truly authentic West Cork culinary experience. Garden at Liss Ard Estates ethos is founded on sourcing the best local ingredients and supporting small farmers, producers and artisans.iHotelier/iStay

name: Berehaven Pods
description: Situated in Castletownbere in the County Cork region and Hungry Hill reachable within 3.9 km, Berehaven Pods features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a private beach area and free private parking. The campground provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. Berehaven Pods offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Dunboy Castle is 10 km from Berehaven Pods, while Puxley Mansion is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kerry Airport, 94 km from the campground.

name: Grásteinn Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Ellis Beach Oceanfront Bungalows
description: Situated on a 5 km strip golden sand, Ellis Beach Oceanfront Bungalows features a swimming pool, children’s pool and restaurant. Each self-catering bungalow has direct beach access. Located halfway between Cairns and Port Douglas, Ellis Beach Bungalows are 5 km from Palm Cove and 30 km from Cairns Airport. Clifton Beach shopping centre is a 10-minute drive away. These spacious bungalows are located directly on the beach and include a kitchenette, air conditioning, flat-screen TV, and a private patio with outdoor seating. Guests have access to self-service laundry facilities and coin-operated BBQs with covered seating area. Free on-site parking is provided. The general store and souvenir shop is open every day. Ellis Bar and Grill serves international cuisine, such as burgers and pizzas. Located across the street from the bungalows, it offers ocean views at breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: The Slate (Sha Plus+)
address: 116 Moo 1 Tambol Sakhu, Talang, Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: The Slate, Phuket presents industrial chic design set against the beautiful natural backdrop of Nai Yang Beach and Andaman Sea. Offering beachfront rooms, it also has a rainforest spa and 3 outdoor pools, one is open for family while the other 2 pools are for adults only. Uniquely decorated with original art pieces and locally crafted furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms feature rich wood and cool stone accents. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and bottled water are included in all rooms. The Slate, Phuket is just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket International Airport. It is a 10-minute drive from Blue Canyon Golf Course and Mission Hills Golf Club. Coqoon Spa offers ultimate relaxation with body massage and facials in The Nest, a private treatment room suspended mid-air like a bird nest. For a refreshing workout, the fitness centre provides yoga, pilates and Muay Thai classes. Guests may experience the charm of Thailand with the hotel's Thai cooking classes, language lessons and Weekend Market day trips. There is also a dive centre and kitesurfing centre next to the hotel. Five dining options leave guests spoilt for choice, serving everything from a breakfast buffet to fresh seafood barbecue dinners. Tongkah Tin Syndicate provides a snooker hall and international whiskeys.

name: Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Nestled on the picturesque shores of Markham Bay, the resort offers sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. With the airport just 45 minutes away and 20 minute-drive to Phuket Town, the hotel is ideally located to explore the many attractions on Phuket island.accorhotels.com

name: The Mooring Resort
description: Set in Panwa Beach, 400 metres from Ao Yon Beach, The Mooring Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star resort offers a range of water sports facilities, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Some units at the property feature a balcony with a sea view. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Mooring Resort all rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Bike hire and car hire are available at The Mooring Resort and the area is popular for snorkelling and canoeing. Panwa Beach is 2.1 km from the resort, while Phuket Aquarium is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 41 km from The Mooring Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rosewood Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Located in Tri Trang Beach in Phuket, Rosewood Phuket features an outdoor pool and water sports facilities. The resort boasts views of the sea, and guests can enjoy contemporary dining experiences at an Italian inspired restaurant. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for cycling. Emerald Bay are 600 metres from Rosewood Phuket, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from Rosewood Phuket.

name: Varana Hotel Krabi
address: 258 Moo 3 Tambol Nongtalay Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Vacation Village Phra Nang Inn
description: Experience a tropical paradise at Phra Nang Inn, located on Ao Nang Beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it has an outdoor pool, spa and open-air bar offering views of the Andaman Sea. Featuring hardwood flooring and furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at the Phra Nang Inn are decorated with seashells. A satellite TV, safe and minibar are included. Traditional Thai herbal massage and other body treatments are offered at the Wareerak Hot Spring Spa. A tour desk and transport services are available for guests. A wide selection of Thai and European dishes are featured at Phra Nang Kitchen, steps away from the beach. Fresh seafood and steaks are offered as well. Guests enjoy cocktails served at Beach Bar. Phra Nang Inn is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. It is just a short stroll from the shopping and dining strip of Ao Nang Beach.

name: Krabi Klong Muang Bay Resort
address: Klong Muang Beach, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Surrounded by gardens, Krabi Klong Moung Bay View Resort is 260 m from Klong Muang Beach and a 10-minute drive from Tub Kaek Beach. It features air-conditioned rooms and a tour desk, which organises excursion to tourist attractions. Free WI-Fi is available in all areas. Krabi Klong Moung Bay View Resort is a 20-minute ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 2-hour ride from Phuket International Airport. The property offers free parking. Bright and airy rooms feature a private balcony with a seating area. They are provided with a flat-screen cable TV, an electric kettle and a refrigerator. Their en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. For meals, enjoy Thai and European dishes at the on-site Bay Restaurant.

name: Melina Beach Front Bungalows
address: 108/1 Moo 3 Ao Thalane Tumbol Khaotong, Ban Tha Lane 81000
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Melina's Beach Front Bungalows puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the boats, canoe, dart board, badminton court, hiking trails. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Krabi has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Melina's Beach Front Bungalows.Agoda

name: Pine Bungalow
address: 99 Moo 2 Nongtalay, Muang, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: A 1-minute walk to Ao Siao Beach or Klong Muang, Pine Bungalow Krabi offers free Wi-Fi in public areas. Free parking is available on site. For extra convenience, the property provides a 24-hour front desk. The hotel is a 10-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach. Krabi Town is a 25-minute ride away. Krabi International Airport can be reached within a 40-minute drive from the hotel. Each room is equipped with a balcony, seating area and en suite bathroom with shower facilities. Laundry services are available. A garden is provided. Pine Bungalow serves a selection of Thai and Western dishes from 08:00 until 20:00 hrs. 24 hour beverage service.

name: Hyatt Regency Koh Samui
description: Situated in Chaweng, 1.9 km from Choeng Mon Beach, Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms include a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher. At Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chaweng, like snorkelling and canoeing. Chaweng Beach is 2.5 km from Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus, while Big Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: W Koh Samui
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Moët Boutique Resort
description: No description found

name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus is situated on the island’s northwestern tip, a quiet oasis on Laem Yai Bay. Windsurfing, golf and a spa are featured. Each room is fitted with a private infinity pool, private bar and iPod dock. Guests can enjoy views of the gardens or Gulf of Siam on the outdoor day bed. The bathroom’s glass doors open onto the private deck for an al fresco bathing experience. Chilled towels are offered at Koh Samui Four Seasons’ beachside infinity pool. Guests can recharge with a game of tennis, a variety of beach sports or a workout at the fitness centre. A large book and DVD library is provided. The hotel’s SIAMSEAS cruising boat offers access to Marine National Park and a variety of other locations. The resort is about a 30-minute drive from both Big Buddha and Koh Samui International Airport. The Four Seasons’ restaurant serves fresh local seafood seasoned with exotic herbs from nearby gardens. Both Thai and International cuisine are offered. The Beach Bar serves a variety of tropical cocktails.

name: King's Garden Resort - Sha Plus
address: 12 Moo 2 Chaweng Beach Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Offering an on-site bar and restaurant, King’s Garden Resort provides free Wi-Fi access in all areas. There is a free public parking available. Pets are allowed at the property upon request, charge may apply. Located in Chaweng Beach, King’s Garden Resort is 400 metre from Petbuncha Thai Boxing Stadium and 1.7 km from Bangkok Hospital Samui. Samui Airport is 3 km from the property. Guests can visit the famous Big Buddha which is a 30-minute drive away. At King’s Garden Resort, each unit features air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. It has a seating area and a refrigerator. Some unit comes with a sea and a garden view. The property provides a front desk up until 21:00 hrs. Guests can enjoy a laundry and a massage service with an extra charge. Beachfront Terrace Café & The Duke Pub serves Thai and International food and beverage.

name: Marina Beach Resort
address: 124/169 M.3, T. Maret Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Conveniently situated along Lamai Beach, Marina Beach Resort - SHA Plus offers spacious rooms that open out to private balconies. It features a restaurant with Thai/Western menus, a beachfront bar and massage services. Resort Marina Beach Lamai is a 10-minute drive from the popular Grandfather and Grandmother rocks. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport and provides free parking. Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with classic wood furnishings, satellite TV and a fridge. Heated showers and a safe are also available. Guests can explore the sights of Samui with help from the tour desk. Staff can also provide laundry and car and motorbike rental services.

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
description: The Sea Koh Samui is located along the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach, a 10-minute drive from Nathon. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The contemporary rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV and a spacious living area. A kitchen area with microwave is provided. Rooms come with an indoor or outdoor hot tub. The Sea Koh Samui is a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Town. Samui Airport is about 11 km away. A fitness centre is available for guests wishing to keep up with their regular work-out. The spa features massage treatments. A tour desk and car rentals are available. Drinks and cocktails are available by the pool. Guests can dine in-room with room service.

name: Bhumlapa Garden Resort
description: Stretching over 3 acres of landscaped grounds, Bhumlapa Garden Resort offers standalone accommodation, a 5-minute walk from Bo Phut Beach. It features an outdoor pool, a spa, and free Wi-Fi. Overlooking the pool or surrounding tropical gardens, villas present an Oriental-style décor with flat-screen TVs, minibar and DVD players. Luxurious and decorated with artworks, they provide well-equipped kitchenettes with cooking facilities. The restaurant serves both Thai and European food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ villas. Local eateries are only a 5-minute walk from Bhumlapa Garden Resort. It offers a shuttle service from Koh Samui Airport, located a 10-minute drive away. Various water activities are available, including diving, snorkeling and fishing. Alternatively, enjoy relaxing massages at the spa.

name: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort
address: 6/16 Moo 5, Ban Plai Laem, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort at Samrong Bay is an ocean front resort, with direct access to the beach. Located on a peaceful area of Koh Samui, vibrant Chaweng Beach is accessible within a short 15-minute drive away with shuttle bus and taxi service provided by the property. Free WiFi is available. All villas have access to a private pool, and most villas have a children pool. All villas come with a private parking and tropical garden. Guests staying in the apartment and studio types can make use of a shared swimming pool. All room types come with an en suite kitchen, separate seating area and a dressing room. Cable TV, a DVD player and BBQ facilities are also available. Guests staying in the villas of Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort have access to barbecue facilities. Guests can request to have their massages in the villa or in front of the sea. Airport shuttle is provided. Idyllic Samui is 10 minutes by car from Fisherman Village where there are many restaurants and small shops. Samui Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: At Samui Haus
description: Located in Lipa Noi, @Samui Haus is a beach front accommodation boasting an outdoor pool, a terrace and free bikes. Free WiFi access is available throughout the area. It is 1.1 km from Niki Beach Samui and 1.4 km from Racha Ferry Pier. Each air-conditioned unit comes with a cable TV, a safety deposit box and a seating area. Complete with an electric kettle, the dining area also has a refrigerator and a minibar. En suite bathroom is equipped with shower facilities, bathrobes and free toiletries. A bath tub is available in some units. For convenience, @Samui Haus can arrange ticketing, car hire and shuttle services. Other facilities include barbeque facilities, room service and massage. For outdoor enthusiasts, snorkeling, canoeing and cycling are available in the surroundings. This resort is 27 km from Chaweng Beach. Samui Airport is 30 km away. Guests can sample Thai and international cuisines at the on-site restaurant or enjoy special drinks and cocktails at the bar.

name: Kirati Beach Resort
address: 24/85 Moo 5 Tambol Bophut, Koh Samui District, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Kirati Beach Resort is situated in the centre of Chengmon Beach, a 5-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and a 15-minute drive from Maenam beach. It offers massage services, a tour desk, and a 24-hour reception. Throughout the stay, guests can enjoy free WiFi. Surrounded by greenery, each air-conditioned room at Kirati Beach Resort comes with a private balcony. Room amenities include a TV, a fridge, and a safety deposit box. Kirati Beach Resort offers laundry services and car rental. Guests can enjoy quiet moments in the garden or on the terrace. The seaside restaurant serves fresh seafood dishes as well as Thai and international specialties. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute drive from this property. Kirati Beach Resort is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. Transfers can be arranged.

name: Bangpo Village
description: Enjoying a beachfront location on Bangpo Beach, this hotel offers simple bungalows featuring wood flooring, private balconies and tropical views. Bangpo Village also features a tour desk and massage services. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. It takes only 10 minutes by car from the hotel to Santiburi Golf course. The Bangpo Village provides a shuttle service to Samui Airport, located a 25-minute drive away. Bungalows offer spacious and well-appointed interiors with a kitchenette, seating area and an en suite bathroom. They are fitted with a minibar, air conditioning and feature a work area in all private balconies. For leisure, guests can visit Chaweng’s famous nightlife spots, located a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Car and motorbike rental facilities are available at the hotel. Room service is provided for convenience. Alternatively, guests can make use of the hotel’s barbecue facilities.

name: Punnpreeda Beach Resort
address: 32 Moo 4, Bang Rak Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located within a short walk of Bang Rak Beach, this 3-star unique hotel features a private beach. It also offers a free shuttle service, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Punnpreeda Beach Resort provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Convenient services include an express check-in feature and a luggage storage area. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private balcony, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all have movies-on-demand, a seating area and bottled water. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. There is also a variety of breakfast options available every day. Punnpreeda Beach Resort is located under a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Guests will find plenty to see and do in the local area, with Chaweng Beach a brief car ride away.Revato

name: Phalarn Inn Resort
description: Phalarn Inn Resort is located along Meanam Beach in North Samui, a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Beach. The hotel offers an outdoor pool and restaurant. Rooms at Phalarn Inn are surrounded by tropical gardens and come with either air-conditioning or fan. Standard amenities include hot water showers. The hotel serves a daily breakfast at its onsite café. Guests can book day trips at the tour desk or relax by the outdoor pool. They can also play golf nearby. Car rentals are available. Phalarn Inn Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport and Nathorn Town. It is less than a 5-minute walk from Lomprayah Pier.

name: Riviera Beach Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Riviera Beach Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Bophut and has a terrace, restaurant and bar. Boasting a private beach area, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a few steps from Bophut Beach, 1.1 km from Bang Rak Beach and 300 metres from Fisherman Village. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Riviera Beach Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Riviera Beach Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Big Buddha is 4.5 km from the hotel, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from Riviera Beach Hotel.

name: Hadsaisuay Resort
description: The 2-star Hadsaisuay Resort and Homestay offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Kanchanaburi. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, restaurant are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including spa, massage, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Hadsaisuay Resort and Homestay.Agoda

name: Intercontinental Hua Hin Resort, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Hua Hin Resort blends Eastern and Western design heritage set alongside sparkling gulf waters for a truly alluring destination. Two accommodation wings feature spacious rooms and suites as well as a swimming pool at each wing. Facilities and amenities include a spa, a fitness centre, versatile event spaces and wide-ranging food and drink venues. Club InterContinental accommodation level, meanwhile, provides guests with more benefits and highly personalised service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin
address: 33/17 Soi Mooban Huadon, Petchasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: A lovely beachfront property just outside Hua Hin Town, Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin offers a relaxing getaway with an outdoor pool and sea-facing restaurant. Rooms and villas are nestled amidst tropical gardens. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings and beddings, Anantasila’s rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of surrounding greenery. Each room comes with cable TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Private bathrooms have a bathtub and shower. Guests can play a round of mini golf, or relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Massages can be enjoyed on the beach, by the pool, or in the privacy of guests’ rooms. Beach views accompany meals at the restaurant, which serves Thai, Western and Italian specialities. Cocktails are available at the beach bar. Anantasila Villa is a 15-minute drive from Hua Hin’s town centre. It provides a free shuttle to a bus stop where guests can catch a minibus to the town centre.

name: Miami Marriott Biscayne Bay
description: Miami Marriott Biscayne Bay offers 360 degrees of stunning views. From mornings on your private balcony to exploring Miami’s dynamic neighborhoods, to evenings at the Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts or a Miami Heat game at the Miami-Dade arena — it’s all just steps away. A newly added fifth-floor rooftop adds a one-of-a-kind backdrop of the bay and city. Meetings become memorable in our 20,000 square feet of stylish meeting space with floor-to-ceiling windows. A perfect wrap to the day with colleagues and friends is found at our waterfront restaurant Gold Coast Kitchen + Cocktails featuring fresh local flavors with a seafood-focused menu and citrus-based craft cocktails. Our newly opened first-floor M Club offers an exclusive way to recharge. Enjoy an invigorating weekend getaway, a relaxing stop on your way to cruising the Caribbean, or an extra day for play after a conference at our Waterfront Hotel in Miami.Marriott

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Dream South Beach
description: Welcoming guests with pets, this hotel is located in Miami Beach and features an infinity pool and a private beach. It also provides a coffee bar, valet parking and a rooftop terrace. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a long day exploring the area, Shala Spa provides an ideal place to relax with massage services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and an iPod docking station. All provide an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Miami Beach's attractions, such as Ocean Drive and Miami Beach Architectural District, are easily accessible on foot from Dream South Beach. Located within a five-minute walk are the Wolfsonian-FIU and Lummus Park.Revato

name: The Balfour Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, ticket service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Hotel Room Mate Lord Balfour combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Miami Beach (FL) unforgettable.Agoda

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
description: Each spacious suite at this hotel in Miami Beach offers Wi-Fi. This European-style hotel offers direct beach access and features 2 outdoor pools and private beach access. The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: Hilton Cabana Miami Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: 2 beach chairs and towels: 2-hour bicycle rental: 20 minutes non-motorized water sports equipment rental: 10% off dinner at hotel restaurant: 2 refillable/recyclable aluminum water bottles. Situated in the heart of Miami Beach, Hilton Cabana Miami Beach is an upscale hotel set within 119 feet of oceanfront property. Located on Collins Avenue at 63rd Street, the hotel is just north of South Beach - in the center of south Florida’s best attractions and trendy neighborhoods. Close to Lincoln Road, Ocean Drive, Aventura Mall and Bal Harbour, the hotel is convenient to the Port of Miami, Miami Convention Center, restaurants, entertainment and nightlife. The hotel features 231 newly renovated oversized guest rooms with one king or two queen beds, plus an array of suites - each with 55-inch flat-screen TV, MP3 player, laptop-size safe, large work desk with ergonomic chair and windows that open. Most guest rooms feature ocean, Intracoastal or pool views and many have balconies. Hilton Cabana Miami Beach offers many on-site amenities including two outdoor pools and beach-side service. A complimentary fitness center is located on the 3rd floor and a complimentary lobby Technology Lounge brings the business center into the middle of the action, with complimentary PCs and iMacs available 24 hours a day. A full-service Concierge Desk is located in the hotel lobby. The hotel's signature Allison Restaurant & Bar celebrates the diverse food culture of Miami’s Latin locals, emphasizing its remarkable beach location by showcasing fresh seafood, tropical flavors and Caribbean cooking techniques. Allison's also has a vibrant bar adjacent to the main seating area, and the bar is an outdoor lounge that overlooks the Atlantic Ocean. In-room dining is also available. For meetings and special events, the hotel has three venues for up to 180 people: space within the two outdoor pools, a 2,040 sq. ft. outdoor courtyard area, and Allison Restaurant & Bar (the on-site restaurant available for private functions). With highly personalized service, an oceanfront address and oversized accommodations, Hilton Cabana Miami Beach is the ideal choice for business and leisure travelers looking for an upscale, modern hotel.Hilton

name: Hyatt Centric South Beach Miami
description: Featuring a third-floor rooftop pool, Hyatt Centric South Beach Miami offers accommodations in bustling South Beach. Guests can stay connected with free property-wide WiFi. A 47-inch Smart TV with Bluetooth, an iPod docking station, and a private bathroom with bath robes and a frosted tile shower are provided. En suite coffee-making facilities are included. This pet-friendly property offers a fitness center, meeting facilities, and beach services that include 2 chaise lounge beach chairs, towels, and bicycles. DECK Sixteen offers Mediterranean fare for breakfast, lunch, and dinner while the bar at DECK Sixteen serves up specialty cocktails and international beers and wines. Lincoln Road is 1969 feet from South Beach Miami Hyatt Centric while Art Deco District is 1.2 miles’ drive. Miami International Airport is 9.3 miles’ drive away.

name: Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort
description: Reflecting the vibrancy and culture, Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort, is a trendy downtown resort in Miami Beach, where Ocean Drive and Collins Avenue intersect. Renowned among South Beach resorts, we connect you with the area’s popular attractions. Arrive in style at our opulent hotel lobby, which retains elements of the building’s original design, including a compass rose on the terrazzo floor, a green-glass reception desk and porthole windows in the lounge. After browsing Miami Beach, unwind with a vitalizing dip in one of the two resort-style pools at our South Beach resort hotel. We also boast a 24-hour fitness center and direct access to our own stretch of sand and surf in Royal Palm Beach. If you’re here for a meeting or wedding, our beachfront venues and attentive service break the mold of Florida events. Relax in luxe hotel rooms and suites inspired by the colorful spirit of Miami. Our boutique resort near Miami Beach beckons you to write your own compelling narrative.Marriott

name: Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach
description: This hotel is located in South Beach, and offers a sun deck, an express check-in and check-out feature and an outdoor pool. It is ideally positioned for those wishing to discover the area's attractions. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach boasts a range of recreational amenities, including bicycle rental and Outdoor Pool & Cabanas. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. There are 75 rooms at Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach houses both a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. Local attractions near the hotel include the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation, Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road. Miami City Ballet is within a 10-minute walk and Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport is 40 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: The Goodtime Hotel
description: Offering 4-star accommodation, The Goodtime Hotel is conveniently situated in South Beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. There are a range of facilities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as fitness classes, a sun deck and valet parking. Guests can unwind with a book in the on-site library. The Goodtime Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, luxury toiletries and blackout curtains. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a shower. The hotel offers breakfast each morning that guests can enjoy before venturing out to discover the local region. Miami Beach's attractions, such as the Jewish Museum of Florida, Lummus Park and the Wolfsonian-FIU, are easily accessible on foot from The Goodtime Hotel. Located within a five-minute walk is Ocean Drive.Revato

name: Hotel Ocean
description: Facing the Atlantic Ocean on South Beach’s famous Ocean Drive, this Miami hotel is less than 2 minutes' walk from the Art Deco Welcome Center. A restaurant and full-service bar are on site. A flat-screen cable TV and a small refrigerator are featured in every contemporary guestroom at Hotel Ocean. The 24-hour reception offers complimentary luggage storage. A concierge service is available, and dry cleaning is offered at the Ocean for a fee. Enjoy free bicycle hire.
