name: Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach
address: Manzana F Lote 1 Puerto Comercial de Pichilingue, La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Set close to Pichilingue beach, 10 miles north of La Paz, Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers a sun terrace. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Puerto Vallarta & Spa Hotel
address: Av. Francisco Medina Ascencio km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Location This hotel lies on the Bahía de Banderas bay and is around 200 m from the nearest beach and the town centre with its access to the public transport network. The airport is only some 5 minutes away. Facilities The hotel features 291 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe, currency exchange facilities and a cash machine. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. In addition, guests can also enjoy a balcony. The hotel features a range of facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, golf and horse riding. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with diving and aquafit. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities including a gym. A wellness area with a spa can be used by guests of the hotel. For a fee, massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner and full board. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Casitas Maraika
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a coffee/tea maker and an outdoor entertainment area. Other amenities include towels, an ice maker, a fan, and tour/ticket assistance.Expedia

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Find your balance among 14 acres of swaying palm trees and fronted by a 410-foot private beach on the Pacific Ocean. The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta offers all this splendor only five minutes from Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport and charming downtown Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Lace up for dining and upscale shops at the marina district across the road. Relax at a beachfront pergola and sparkling pool or book an appointment at our serene spa offering head-to-toe pampering. Our Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, resort hotel features a Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and nearby golf courses. Bright colors and tropical Mexican décor grace every ocean-view hotel room at our resort, and each accommodation includes a private balcony, plush Heavenly® Bed and rejuvenating Heavenly® Bath. Recharge the right way at The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta.Marriott

name: Olas Altas Suites
address: Rodolfo Gomez 158, Col. Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Olas Altas Suites is located 100 metres from Los Muertos Beach and 20 minutes’ drive from Puerto Vallarta International Airport. It features free Wi-Fi and free parking. The suites at Olas Altas offer art-colourful décor, air conditioning, safety box, seating area and flat-screen cable TV. All of the suites have a fully equipped kitchenette with fridge and stove. The bathroom is private and has shower. Restaurant Michel on site serves Italian food to its guests. Several options within 400 metres as Mexican and local food are available. Olas Altas Suites is 800 metres from Cuale Island and 15 minutes’ drive from Puerto Vallarta Town Centre. Cihuatlán-Puerto Vallarta Motorway is 200 metres away. Guest may request a Private Luxury Yacht and Lunch tour or even shuttle from the airport at an extra cost.

name: Vallarta Shores Beach Hotel
address: Calle Malecon 400, Amapas, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Vallarta Shores Condohotel, located on Puerto Vallarta's Los Muertos Beach features one to four bedroom suites with fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen cable TV and a balcony overlooking the beach and Banderas Bay. The Sky Suites feature 3 and 4 bedrooms, a private pool and private chef service included in the rate. Also, these suites feature an open-air living room, dining area and an outdoor terrace with views of every angle of the property. Private chef service included with our 3 and 4 bedroom Suites (no extra charge) This luxury boutique hotel is close to a wide range of restaurants, the city's Old Town and the Malecón. Staff at reception can provide information and recommendations. Local attractions include the Cuale Archaeological Museum, Plaza de Armas and the Parish Church of Our Lady of Guadalupe. Vallarta Shores is nearby many local restaurants and shops.

name: Friendly Vallarta Beach Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio #2199, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: A reimagined and reinvented hotel, made to enjoy, live together, rest and create unique moments. For those who are looking for different, memorable and fun experiences.With one of the best beaches in Puerto Vallarta, excellent location near to hospitals, bars, restaurants, shopping mall, etc. just a few minutes from the Airport and the Malecon or downtown.The friendliest hotel now is fun.iHotelier/iStay

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz
address: Blvd Manuel Avila Camacho, 94299 Veracruz, Veracruz-Llave
description: Situated in a select area of Boca del Río, this luxurious hotel offers relaxing spa services and enjoyable on-site facilities, such as 2 gourmet restaurants, just minutes from the convention center. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a safety deposit box. All rooms also have private bathrooms. Grand Fiesta Americana Veracruz is beach-front and offers excellent views. Go swimming in the indoor or outdoor pools. After a busy day, aromatherapy treatment in the spa. Enjoy seafood, Italian at Arantzia Restaurant and Rosato Restaurant and have a drink at the snack bar and lobby bar. For casual dining in a vibrant atmosphere, stop by the hotel's cafe, where a daily continental breakfast is served.

name: Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel
address: Av Pedro Joaquin Codwell, Manzana 19 Lote 1, 77310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: This beachfront hotel is located on an island 25 km long and 2 km wide, without any cars. Rooms include a private terrace or balcony. All rooms at the Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel are decorated in Caribbean style and include free WiFi, a private bathroom and 2 beds. Air conditioning and a fan are provided for added comfort. Guests of the Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel have access to a private beach that prohibits the golf carts used for transportation around the island. Beach towels are available at the reception area. An outdoor pool is also available. Tours of the island area itself, and the many exotic fish, birds and dolphins it contains, are also available.

name: Corinthia Palace Malta
description: Corinthia Palace Malta is set on Malta Island, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of San Anton. Guests of Corinthia Palace Malta can start their morning at Athenaeum Spa, or enjoy the many fitness and leisure facilities, including pilates classes, fitness classes and outdoor tennis courts. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sauna and outdoor tennis courts. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature a telephone, a radio and a desk. Each morning, guests can wake up to breakfast at Rickshaw or Orange Grove Brasserie. In the evening, guests are invited to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of eating options are also found nearby. Within a 20-minute drive of St. John's Co-Cathedral and Malta International Airport, Corinthia Palace Malta offers an airport shuttle service for those staying at the property. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Attard.Revato

name: LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa
description: Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is located in one of the best-preserved areas of northern Malta and overlooks the scenic Marfa Bay. Unspoiled views over the islands of Gozo and Comino create an idyllic Mediterranean atmosphere of relaxation. Guests of the LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa have access to a wide range of amenities, including two outdoor seawater swimming pools, an indoor seawater pool and a full-service Spa Centre. At Elysium Spa guests can choose from a wide range of therapy and beauty treatments. True relaxation, however, requires a holistic approach. It is more than just enjoying sea views, swimming pools and spa treatments. Indulging in superior food is also part of a comforting and rejuvenating vacation. The ability to savour an appetisingly crafted quality meal or taste a snack by the pool is among the most important experiences for guests of a Select Hotel. Therefore, Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa does its best to offer a wide array of world-class restaurants as well as bars for its valued guests. The hotel is located in Mellieha, a popular and picturesque village in Malta. It offers visitors a nice mix of experiences, from idyllic sandy beaches and authentic restaurants, to several historical sites. The latter include Saint Agathas Tower, the Church of our Lady Victory, and the Mellieha WWII air-raid shelters. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa also provides adventure seeking guests with the ability to take part in various scuba diving activities. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a diverse vacation in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.iHotelier/iStay

name: Intercontinental Malta
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: InterContinental Malta has established itself as the Mediterranean’s leading hotel of distinction. Located in the prime area of St. George’s Bay in St. Julian's, just seven kilometres from Valletta. All 481 rooms are elegantly furnished, having all the comforts expected of a luxury hotel. With a variety of restaurants and bars, the hotel offers varied cuisine at all times of the day. The leisure facilities include three pools, a kids club, a Fitness Centre, a spa, a beach club and room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Luna Holiday Complex
description: Luna Holiday Complex offers self-catering accommodation 400 metres away from the beach on Mellieha Bay. It features 2 outdoor swimming pools, an indoor pool for winter months and a range of bars and restaurants. Luna Holiday apartments are well equipped with a kitchenette and living area. Free WiFi is available in the lobby. A continental breakfast is available daily. This 3-star complex also features a small grocery market, a diving centre and Fitness Gym.

name: Hotel Quinta da Penha de França
address: Rua Imperatriz Dona Amelia 85, 9000-018 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within tropical gardens on Madeira Island, this charming guesthouse features far-reaching sea views and 2 outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated in winter period. The rooms’ balconies offer views of the scenic gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. All rooms are equipped with telephone, mini-bar, safe, cable TV and a hair dryer. Guests can relax with a massage treatment at Quinta Da Penha De França. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk service. Quinta Da Penha De França’s restaurant, The Brothers provides an a la carte menu with views of the garden and guests can dine al fresco at Penha França Mar Restaurant Rivus, with views of the the sea Free private parking is available. Cristiano Ronaldo's Museum is 200 metres away and the Madeira Congress Centre is a 5-minute walk from the property. Free WiFi is available in the lounge and reception areas of the hotel.

name: Penina Hotel & Golf Resort
description: Set within expansive, lush gardens, this 5-star resort in the Algarve is 5 km from Portimão and the city of Lagos. Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a selection of sports and leisure facilities, including 3 golf courses and a large outdoor swimming pool. The rooms at Penina Hotel & Golf Resort are filled with natural light and have plush beds with white linens. Some open onto balconies and feature seating areas. Many overlook the pool area. Leisure amenities include massage treatments, a sauna, a well-equipped fitness centre, 5 on site tennis courts. For younger guests, Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a Children's Club, which offers weekly programmes with a selection of leisure and sporting activities. There are 5 restaurants available, which serve a range of Portuguese, Italian and international cuisine. Children’s menus and themed evenings are offered. The 4 on site bars provide light snacks and cocktails. Free parking is offered at the hotel. Alvor Beach and Continente Shopping Centre are both a 5-minute drive away from the Penina Hotel & Golf Resort.

name: Silver Garden
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a seasonal outdoor pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: Mala Garden Design Hotel
description: Designed in Bali Island-style, the 4-star superior Mala Garden Design Hotel is situated directly on the shore of Lake Balaton in Siófok. It offers a restaurant with Hungarian, Thai and vegetarian cuisine and free WiFi. The spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, an infrared sauna, a tropical shower and Thai massages. All rooms at Mala Garden Design Hotel are air-conditioned and are decorated with warm colours, hardwood floors and comfortable, large beds. The Mandara Modern Italian Kitchen offers home-made pastries, cocktails and hot dishes, as well as a lake-side terrace. Guests can rent bicycles, windsurfing and swimming in Lake Balaton or relax on the private sun terrace above the water. The hotel provides parking in a secured parking area, available on request and for a surcharge.

name: Hunguest Hotel Bal Resort
description: The Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort in Balatonalmádi offers panoramic views over Lake Balaton and a modern spa centre with a large indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort are air-conditioned and feature a satellite TV with pay TV channels and a minibar. Spa facilities include a hot tub, saunas, steam baths and a wide range of massages. From the relaxation room you can enjoy views of the lush green garden. Typical Hungarian specialities as well as international cuisine are served in the restaurant of the Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort. The property offers private parking for a surcharge.

name: Tihany Yacht Club
description: Set in Tihany, 2.7 km from Tihany Abbey. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site. Rooms include a TV. All rooms include a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Some rooms also have air conditioning. You can engage in various activities, such as windsurfing and cycling. Tihany Marina is 1.5 km from Tihany Yacht Club, while Inner Lake of Tihany is 2.1 km from the property.

name: Sirius Hotelsuperior
description: Set in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Sirius Hotel****Superior offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 8 km from Thermal Lake Hévíz, 30 km from Sümeg Castle and 48 km from Zalaszentiván Vasútállomás. Festetics Castle is 1.9 km away and Blue Church is 7.9 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sirius Hotel****Superior all rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Sirius Hotel****Superior offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna, hot tub and spa centre. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English and Hungarian. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from Sirius Hotel****Superior.

name: Lua Resort - Adults Only
description: Facing the beachfront, LUA Resort - Adults only offers 5-star accommodation in Balatonfüred and has a shared lounge, terrace and restaurant. 2.7 km from Eszterhazy Beach and 6.8 km from Tihany Abbey, the property offers a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. LUA Resort - Adults only provides some rooms with lake views, and rooms come with a balcony. All units will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden. Annagora Aquapark is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Balatonfüred train station is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 87 km from LUA Resort - Adults only.

name: Hotel Helikon
description: Located in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Hotel Helikon, Keszthely provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a lake view. Every room includes a safety deposit box and selected rooms are equipped with city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at Hotel Helikon, Keszthely. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving local, international and Hungarian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hotel Helikon, Keszthely offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a spa centre. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Hotel Helikon, Keszthely include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Balaland Residence Apartmanhotel
description: Located 600 metres from Szantod Ferry, Balaland Residence Apartmanhotel Apartmanhotel offers a bar, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, lake views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with bath or shower. A private beach area is available on site. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 60 km from the accommodation.

name: Napsugár Club és Panzió
description: Located in Fonyód, Napsugár Club és Panzió offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a private beach area and a garden. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. The restaurant at Napsugár Club és Panzió serves pizza, local and Hungarian cuisine. The accommodation offers an outdoor fireplace. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Napsugár Club és Panzió can arrange a bicycle rental service. Thermal Lake Hévíz is 39 km from the bed and breakfast, while Balaton Museum is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 38 km from Napsugár Club és Panzió.

name: Vadkacsa Panzio
description: Set in Balatonkenese, 20 km from Bella Stables and Animal Park and 21 km from Bebo Aquapark, Vadkacsa Panzio offers a restaurant, lake views and free WiFi. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Vadkacsa Panzio offers a terrace. Cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby, while a bicycle rental service and a private beach area are also available on site. Tihany Abbey is 35 km from the accommodation, while Museum of Minerals is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 111 km from Vadkacsa Panzio.

name: Tisza-beach wild camping 5
description: Situated in Szeged in the Csongrád region, with Votive Church Szeged and Szeged National Theater nearby, Tisza-beach wild camping 5 features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a fitness room. At the campground you will find a restaurant serving Hungarian and grill bbq cuisine. Tisza-beach wild camping 5 offers an outdoor fireplace. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Ópusztaszer Heritage Park is 29 km from Tisza-beach wild camping 5, while New Synagogue is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Arad International Airport, 94 km from the campground.

name: Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference
description: Just 30 metres from the Aqua-Palace and a 5-minute walk from Hajdúszoboszló’s thermal bath, Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference has a modern spa with an indoor pool, a stylish pool terrace, a gym, and a restaurant. Air conditioning and free WiFi are standard room facilities at Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference. Each room has its own balcony. Flooded with natural light, the indoor pool lies in the centre of the wellness centre. Next to it there is a large hot tub and plenty of lounging space. There are different types of saunas, steam baths and even an ice cave. Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference’s restaurant serves national and international dishes. For a light snack or a drink, there is also a bar. Room service is available.

name: Hotel Délibáb
description: The 4-star Hotel Délibáb is located next to the popular Hungarospa Bath, the biggest bath complex in Europe. Hajdúszoboszló city is located at the edge of Hortobágy Puszta and is just 20 km from Debrecen. Wi-Fi is available in all areas of the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV, a minibar and anti-stress bed linen. The private bathroom comes with a shower, bathrobes and a hair-dryer. For an extra charge, guests can access the Bath Complex through the open-air courtyard of the property. Hotel Delibab offers buffet breakfast, half board and 1 à la carte restaurant with modern Hungarian and international dishes. The bar features darts and billiard facilities.

name: Casablanca Panzió
description: Casablanca Panzió pension can be found right on the banks of the Old Lake and offers you free WiFi and free parking. The en-suite rooms furnished in Oriental style come with a minibar and a desk. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The bathrooms feature a shower. A private balcony is offered for some of the units. Conference rooms are at your disposal as well in Casablanca Panzió Pension. The city centre of Tata can be reached within a 5-minute stroll.

name: Vilnius Grand Resort
description: Vilnius Grand Resort is set among 280 hectares of verdant countryside and sprawling by pine and birch forest. The hotel features free WiFi, a large, heated indoor swimming pool, steam baths and saunas. The hotel offers well-appointed rooms as well as luxurious suites. Most of them have an LCD TV with interactive programming. Guests can relax in the V SPA Wellness centre, with 2 spa areas Aqua and Vitality. Aqua spa area features a swimming pool, kids pool with a water slide, sauna, steam bath and a hot tub. Vitality pool area comes with cascades, grotto, outside and inside hot tub, steam bath, Finnish and Russian saunas and relaxation rooms. Please note that Vitality pool area is adults only. There is also a tennis court and the hotel is surrounded by a magnificent 18-hole championship golf course - the V Golf Club. There are 2 restaurants on site. Vilnius Grand Resort offers classic European dishes with a French accent. Vilnius Grand Resort is only a 20-minute drive from the centre of Vilnius. A complimentary shuttle bus is available.

name: TonyResort
description: Located in Anupriškes, TonyResort is on the shore of Lake Gilušis. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It has a private beach area and a tennis court that can be used for free between 8 and 10 am. It also offers horse riding activities. The rooms of the TonyResort are bright and elegant. All feature views of pine forest and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a terrace and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The resort offers such outdoor activities as fishing, water sports, a ropes course and cycling. A volleyball court is also available. Apart from that, guests can enjoy the sauna and the hot tub. The resort has a spacious restaurant that serves European cuisine and grilled dishes, including fresh trout caught in the nearby lake. In the mornings breakfast is available. Situated in a quiet location, TonyResort offers you a chance to relax away from the rush of city life. The nearest city is Trakai, 9 km away.

name: Kempingas Slenyje
description: Holiday Center Slenis is located by Lake Galvė, in the 19th century Tatars’ manor territory. It offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and wonderful views of the area, with the Trakai Castle and islands scattered all over the lake. Each room at the Slenis features a private bathroom and is uniquely decorated. Guests can choose from classically done interiors, as well as Art-Nouveau style ones. The Holiday Center offers massage services, a hot tub and saunas – a Finnish one, a Japanese one and a traditional Russian banya. Guests can bathe under the illuminated waterfall, enjoy a water slides and try a hot air balloon flight. Holiday Center Slenis has 2 cafés, one of which is housed in the cellar. Breakfast and packed lunches are available. There are also picturesque views of the of area. The property boasts a beach with deckchairs during summer and there is a possibility to ice-skate during winter. There is an underwater sculpture museum 30 metres from the Slenis. The Central Railway Station is 7.4 km away.

name: Kliukai
description: Homestead "Kliukai" is located in a picturesque area on a hill, near the big water pond. It is perfect for a quiet family recreation and leisure. We offer four comfortable, spacious holiday cottages for 4-8 persons for your perfect family vacation. We believe, that our guests, who choose homestead KLIUKAI, must find as much natural beauty as possible - it might not give the impression of luxury, but it is 100 percent real, created, invented, made by the owners of the homestead or local craftsmen, and sometimes found or bought and "domesticated". This is why we are trying to build everything by ourselves and we’re not afraid to make a mistake: - We are not trying to substitute natural grass with artificial lawn "carpet", but cut short the real plants, which are growing here, so we do not get angry if it’s a nettle, wormwood, thistle. - You won’t find sleek urban flower gardens with beautiful stones, brought from other places, or artificial waterfalls. - We are trying to create surrounding from trees and bushes, found in a local forest, and only rarely insert decorative flowers to the composition. And when we find a stone, we put it so, that it would look harmonic in a surrounding, not overshadow it. - We avoid artificial pads on terraces and pathways. We build pathways from the broken stones pads in a way, that the grass, which grows in the gaps, would cover it completely. We believe, that our visitor is not the one, who is afraid to spoil their feet or their high heels to be stuck in the ground, but the opposite - the one, who comes here to rest and relax in the nature, not thinking, how do they look, but appreciate, how do they feel here. - You will find all necessary amenities in a homestead, neat and clean premises, but please do not expect air conditioning or gilded water faucets, because it is a RURAL TOURISM. Here you can surely find badly situated plank, bent nail, squeaky stairs, because we’re trying to build as much as possible by ourselves and we believe, it creates a very specific style and cosiness, which is appreciated by our guests. Every holiday cottage has: -separate yard with outdoor furniture, -terrace, -fully equipped kitchen, -living room - dining room with a fireplace and TV, -shower and WC, -bedrooms with perfect views to the surrounding nature. So you are very welcome here to stay, relax and enjoy sauna.VRBO

name: Lake House Villa Pas Eugenija
address: Migiškių k., Alantos sen., Molėtų r., Alanta LT-33314
description: Situated in Migiškiai in the Utena county region, Lake House Villa pas Eugenija has a terrace. This self-catered country house features a garden. Featuring lake and garden views, this country house features 4 bedrooms and opens to a balcony. There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with an oven and a microwave. The country house offers a barbecue. A children's playground and a terrace are offered at Lake House Villa pas Eugenija. Upon prior arrangement at surcharge the property can organise children's parties with bouncing castles Utena is 31 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Vilnius Airport, 76 km from Lake House Villa pas Eugenija.

name: Sala Resort Plateliai & Spa
description: Sala Resort Plateliai in Plateliai provides accommodation with a garden, a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi and free parking. The resort features garden views and a children's playground. At the resort the rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Sala Resort Plateliai offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Cycling, fishing and canoeing are among the activities that guests of the accommodation can find nearby. The nearest airport is Palanga International Airport, 60 km from Sala Resort Plateliai.

name: Duriu sodyba
address: Pečiuliai 11, Luokesos sen., Molėtų r. sav., Molėtai LT-33135
description: Situated in Molėtai in the Utena county region and Lithuanian Ethnocosmology Museum reachable within 18 km, Duriu sodyba features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a private beach area and free private parking. Some of the units have a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. The country house offers a terrace. A bicycle rental service is available at Duriu sodyba, while fishing can be enjoyed nearby. Horse Museum is 45 km from the accommodation, while European Center Golf Club is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vilnius International Airport, 79 km from Duriu sodyba.

name: Čiki Puki Glamping
description: Situated in Palanga, 500 metres from Vanagupe Beach and 2.6 km from Palanga Beach, Čiki Puki Glamping offers a private beach area and air conditioning. Located on the beachfront, this property features free bikes, a shared lounge and a terrace. Towels and bed linen are provided in the luxury tent. A barbecue is available for guests at the luxury tent to use. Palanga Church of the Assumption is 4.5 km from Čiki Puki Glamping, while Palanga Sculpture Park is 5.5 km away. The nearest airport is Palanga International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Residencial Costa Esmeralda
description: Located 6 km from Canasvieiras beach, Residencial Cachoeira do Bom Jesus offers units with a full kitchenette and free parking. The building features an outdoor pool, garden, barbecue facility, playground, and a private beach for guests. The units at Residencial Cachoeira do Bom Jesus provide a private bathroom fitted with a shower. The kitchenette includes a refrigerator, stove, oven, kitchenware and microwave. Jurerê Internacional beach is 7 km away. Praia dos Ingleses beach is 10 km from this apart hotel. Florianópolis city centre is 27 km from the property. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 45 km from this property.

name: Ingleses Praia Hotel
description: Located by Ingleses beach in Florianópolis, Ingleses Praia Hotel offers an outdoor pool and indoor pool with sauna. Guests can enjoy their beach service and relax by the sea. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. The accommodations are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some categories have a sea view and a kitchenette. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 39 km from the property.

name: Residencial Ponta das Canas
address: Avenida Luiz Boiteaux Piazza, 5282, Bloco A/B, Florianopolis 88056-000
description: Located in Florianópolis, Residencial Vila Garapuvu offers an outdoor pool. The property is located 6 km from the beautiful beach of Canasvieiras 18.5 km from Floripa Shopping Mall and 30 km from Hercilio Luz Airport. The accommodation offers air conditioning and a balcony with a view and others with balconies overlooking the pool or the neighborhood. The apartment includes two bedrooms, a seating area, a bathroom with a shower and a kitchen with a refrigerator, a stove top, and cooking utensils. At Residencial Vila Garapuvu you will find a garden and a terrace. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Santa Catarina Island (24.4 km) and Joaquina Beach (27.6 km).Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport is located 31 km away.

name: Pousada Quinta da Margem
description: Situated on Barra channel, between the lagoon and the sea, this guest house is set in a pleasant park. It offers self-catering apartments with free Wi-Fi. Kayaks are available for rent. Apartments at Pousada Quinta da Margem are air-conditioned and provide flat-screen TV, seating and dining areas. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, stove and oven. The private bathroom includes a shower. Praia Mole beach is 1.5 km from Pousada Quinta da Margem. Barra da Lagoa local attraction is 1 km away. Florianópolis city centre and its bus station are both within 20 km.

name: Kilombo Villas & Spa
description: Kilombo Villas & Spa offers 5 exclusive villas with 9 different types of accommodations. It is 7 km from Pipa Beach and features a large outdoor swimming pool, private beach and a personalized butler service. The 5 exclusive villas have a contemporary design and include a fully-equipped kitchenette and LCD cable TV. Each villas are air-conditioned and have large windows offering panoramic views. Each includes a sun terrace with a private hot tub. Guests can enjoy a variety of day trips such as dolphin watching, horse riding and kayaking. The Kibo Restaurant & Bar offers Brazilian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The resort is located 81 km from Natal and free parking is possible.

name: Porto Pacuiba Hotel Ilhabela
description: Situated in beautiful Ilhabela, on Praia do Viana, Porto Pacuíba was recently renovated and offers spacious accommodation. Guests can enjoy on-site amenities, which include an indoor pool, a heated outdoor pool with a wet bar, three Japanese hot tubs for adults and a children's hot tub, a deck with panoramic ocean views, and free parking. Rooms at Porto Pacuíba Hotel feature silent air conditioning and a Smart LCD satellite TV with over 90 TV channels, music and Netflix. Some accommodations also feature a hot tub and a balcony with a private hammock overlooking the sea or garden. Run by Chef Lucas Figueiredo, the Portofino Restaurant has an international menu with a hint of local cuisine. Guests can also enjoy the breakfast buffet, which includes more than 50 options of homemade cakes, jams and cheeses. You can also relax by the pool with a drink from the hotel bar, enjoy a revitalizing massage at the spa and use the sauna. For your convenience, free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.
